programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Ever since Jacqueline Priddin's parents moved to the Costa del Sol, she and husband Anthony have dreamt of also buying a place there for them and their daughter Izzy. Now they have decided to make that happen, so Ben Hillman shows them five homes in the inland area west of Malaga that suit their £50,000 budget. But will it be a town house or a rustic finca that wins them over?.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Property expert Laura Hamilton helps a family hunt for an ideal holiday home near Torrevieja on Spain's southern Costa Blanca. The end of the Spanish property boom raises hopes that the Framptons' budget of £150,000 will stretch farther than expected.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps Christine Vaughan, who is looking for a holiday home in Barbados on a budget of £150,000 and also wants to generate income by renting out the property. However, the Caribbean island's sunny weather leaves Christine struggling to focus on business.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman embarks on a property search on the Caribbean island of St Vincent, and finds that a budget of £200,000 and house-hunters with uncompromising tastes force her to take drastic action to locate a suitable home.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Former How Clean is Your House? presenter Kim Woodburn and her husband Pete decide they would like to take ownership of a holiday home on the glamourous Costa Del Sol, so Jonnie Irwin takes them to view five penthouses that meet their £200,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: Coast vs Country
programme.desc: Retired engineer Barry and his Maltese-born partner Pauline search for a property in Suffolk, on a budget of £425,000. Presented by David Bull and Kirsty Duffy.(n)

programme.title: Coast vs Country
programme.desc: Kerr Drummond and Sara Damergi help Louisa and Julian, who want to move from their one-bedroom house in Middlesex to a more spacious home in south Devon on a budget of £260,000.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Baltimore, Maryland, where Denise Whiting has alienated customers by trademarking the word `hon', a term of endearment used by the local community. When she opened Cafe Hon in 1992 it was a roaring success, but as a result of Denise's unwavering business ambition, people started to boycott the restaurant, leaving her frustrated by falling sales.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's next stop is Philadelphia, where family-run restaurant Chiarella's is struggling to survive in an area full of thriving Italian eateries. Tommy and Dina Defino's marriage is on the verge of collapse and his sense of personal failure only adds to the troubles of their crisis-ridden business.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In the conclusion of Gordon Ramsay's visit to La Galleria 33 in Boston, Massachusetts, he confronts sisters Rita and Lisa with an ultimatum, and finds himself stuck in a war between the waiters, chefs and owners over who is to blame for the Italian restaurant's failings.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer head to Surrey, where Susie and Andy Clark's house is set to be demolished. However, the couple are still looking for a new home after 18 months of searching. Meanwhile, first-time buyers Sam Summers and Jess Jeary have a firm idea of what they want, but need help turning their dreams into a reality.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: James Constantinou gets stopped in his tracks test driving a £30,000 Radical racing car, memorabilia expert Lawrence Pickett deals with an intriguing enquiry about a piece of pop art, while handbag expert Claudia Valentin is moved to tears by a client with an emotional story. James also values a tiara belonging to a martial arts fan, which could be worth £40,000.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: This edition explores the challenges that inevitably come with the end of life, and how the emergency services have to learn to cope when dealing with death on a daily basis. In Warrington, paramedics arrive at the home of a man having a suspected cardiac arrest, and with CPR already being carried out and a defibrillator at close hand, the man is given the best possible chance of survival. Plus, ambulance staff and police officers discuss being called to sudden deaths.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Three young men from different walks of life are brought in to the A&E department of St George's Hospital in London, including 17-year-old Shea, who has serious stab wounds and is sent to a high dependency unit. Fellow 17-year-old Bob arrives after impaling his leg on a fence while taking a shortcut home from his boys' school, and 33-year-old James is brought in by ambulance after fainting at home.(n)

programme.title: Catching a Killer
programme.desc: Documentary about Thames Valley Police's investigation into the disappearance of 31-year-old mother of three Natalie Hemming on May 1, 2016. The programme has extraordinary access to the officers as they try to work out whether Natalie is alive or dead, and to her family and friends, struggling with the situation unfolding around them, before an arrest is made and the case reaches its heartbreaking conclusion.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Noel tries to fix a cocker spaniel's leg problems by fitting two bionic back feet, before launching a series of investigations into what is causing a cat to drag its leg. Plus, a Westie puppy with a fractured knee arrives, but it cannot keep still.(n)

programme.title: One Killer Punch
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the consequences of deadly single hits, from a row over a parking space in a supermarket car park to an unanticipated fight outside a nightclub. By examining three different assaults, the film shows that a single punch can have a colossal effect, often in innocuous locations and circumstances. The programme hears from three accidental killers and observes the circumstances that led up to a fatal punch, how their lives have changed, how their guilt affects them and the complex emotional journey that follows.(n)

programme.title: Bizarre ER
programme.desc: New series. The most unexpected cases from UK A&E departments, beginning with a man who was injured by his own bicycle, and a soldier who took a spill off a bouncy castle. Previously seen on E4.(n)

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by comedian and presenter Sue Perkins for a comic review of the significant moments of the past seven days, with a special focus on the General Election. The quartet offer their own unique insight into some of the most difficult and delicate issues in modern Britain, and answer that most important of questions: is it OK?.(n)

programme.title: Kirstie's Handmade Treasures
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp attempts an improvised flower arrangement at the Royal Cornwall Show, and is offered moral support from fellow competitor the Rev Danny Reed.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: At London Road Pawnbrokers in Sheffield, an unusual Harley-Davidson motorbike, an antique flapper purse and a pair of solid gold coins keep Dan and his assistant Ellie busy doing high-end deals. At Nikolas Patrick in Kent, staff broker a deal on a fur coat and ring, and a 100-year-old music player.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Sheffield pawnbroker Dan Hatfield and his team try to do a deal on a set of rare commemorative stamps signed by legendary astronaut Buzz Aldrin, an upcycled burger van and a huge diamond ring. In Kent, pawnbroking brothers Charlie and Patrick Devine check out an antique dentist chair, while a possible deal on an £18,000 beach hut is enough to get Charlie on a trip to the seaside.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with Paul and his American bride Alissa, who were looking for a property in Windsor, Berkshire, and revisit Malcolm and Jenny in Wiltshire who wanted a welcoming and cosy atmosphere for their prospective home.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer head to north-west England, where Richard and Helen Francis have been experiencing the city-centre lifestyle in Manchester. However, with a baby on the way, they are looking to move to the suburbs on a budget of £400,000. In Preston, Graham and Nina Walker hope to swap their tiny rented terraced house for their first marital home.(n)

programme.title: Coast vs Country
programme.desc: The experts help a couple looking for a property in Essex, with Kirsty Duffy showcasing the countryside and David Bull keen to show them the benefits of living by the coast.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts at the Brighton Surf hotel, where Jeremy and Elena Mann hope their hands-off hosting style will win the approval of their guests.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Housing officer Niru Ghai-Read hosts the first dinner party in Wolverhampton, and feels confident her Indian-themed menu and choice of entertainment will secure her the £1,000 prize. Stefano Scaringi stuns his fellow guests - hippie Kyle Ferguson, part-time model May Dudley and student Bally Singh - with intimate questions, and Niru tries to maintain control on a noisy and eventful night.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Restaurant manager Stefano Scaringi hosts the second night in Wolverhampton, but has more than food on his mind, and an unexpected dessert drama causes chaos in the kitchen. Later, Kyle goes from chilled-out hippie to raging bull.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Bally Singh decides on a student theme when he hosts the third dinner party in Wolverhampton, and his guests are stunned when he serves up beans on toast for his starter. Meanwhile, May Dudley has to endure another night of Stefano Scaringi's corny one-liners.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: IT worker Kyle Ferguson hosts the penultimate party of the week in Wolverhampton. The laid-back, self-confessed hippie has always been keen to offer his opinion throughout the week but now faces the challenge of impressing his guests by serving up a menu of his own.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Model May Dudley hosts the final day of the culinary competition in Wolverhampton, and leaves the planning to her mother. The evening begins on a high, until serving the tiger-prawn starter proves stressful, and the winner of the £1,000 prize is announced.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Baltimore, Maryland, where Denise Whiting has alienated customers by trademarking the word `hon', a term of endearment used by the local community. When she opened Cafe Hon in 1992 it was a roaring success, but as a result of Denise's unwavering business ambition, people started to boycott the restaurant, leaving her frustrated by falling sales.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Wilkinsburg in Pennsylvania, home to Ms Jean's Southern Cuisine, which was opened by retired special-education teacher Jean Gould. During the chef's attempt to save the business from disaster, he discovers her soul-food restaurant resembles a dentist's waiting room and finds a lot of tension between Jean and her employees, who claim she is a Jekyll-and-Hyde character.(n)

programme.title: Cabins in the Wild with Dick Strawbridge
programme.desc: Dick Strawbridge and Will Hardie take a look at a cabin inspired by the legend of King Arthur and a low-tech double-decker tepee. They also travel further afield in search of inspiration for their own projects, visiting a sea fort in the English Channel and a romantic retreat in Sussex.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two sets of first-time buyers who are struggling to find homes. In Southampton, Jenny and Tom are keen to move out of their cramped rental property and into a house of their own, but they are facing fierce competition and a fast market. Meanwhile, in the New Forest, Georgie and Will are desperate to live together after seven years of being a couple. However, with Will working in Belgium during the week, the pair are finding suitable properties are snapped up before they have even had the chance to view them.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, featuring The Spy Who Loved Me, Andrew Neil with Jeremy Corbyn, the SNP's Manifesto, Paul Hollywood's Continental Road Trip, the Green Party and SNP's Party Election Broadcasts, Your Face or Mine, Great British Skinny Dip and the News.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three previous restaurants he tried to save, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he heads for West Babylon, New York, where he helped the inexperienced owners of restaurant Classic American deal with their escalating debts, before returning to Davide in Boston, an Italian restaurant run by two warring brothers. Finally, he visits Down City, a restaurant in Providence, Rhode Island, run by hot-headed owner Abby.(n)

programme.title: The World's Weirdest Weather
programme.desc: Another look at some of the globe's most bizarre climatic conditions and the science behind them, including a vast cave system with its own weather, a desert in Brazil where people swim in lagoons while surrounded by huge sand dunes, and a lake in Argentina with water than can look like concrete. Plus, glow-in-the-dark waves in the Californian city of San Diego, a Canadian family who filmed an upside-down rainbow, a 50-year puzzle of mysterious lights in the Michigan sky, and `spider lightning' in Texas.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Dance Moms
programme.desc: Abby brings in Broadway star Todrick Hall to direct the girls in an advertisement, while Maddie and Brynn captain trio teams to compete head to head. US reality series about the world of competitive dance.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Rory allows Cate to talk him into trying out for the basketball team, while Bridget accidentally destroys Kerry's tribute to Paul, leading to renewed hostility. Comedy, starring Martin Spanjers.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Rory discovers Bridget and Kerry are hoping to attend a party with their boyfriends during the holiday. Cate plans a Thanksgiving dinner to raise the family's spirits, and Laura visits Jim at the Hennessy house. Starring Martin Spanjers, Katey Sagal and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.sub-title: The Story of Anne Frank and Skeevy.
programme.desc: Bridget lands the lead role as Anne Frank in the school play, but has misgivings about whether she is right for the role. Rory's obsession with a dummy named Skeevy provokes concern among the Hennessy family.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: An exercise class gives Rory an experience he did not expect, and Kerry finds a new friend who shares her opinions of blondes.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Cate's wayward nephew CJ drops in to pay his respects to the recently deceased Paul, but soon lands himself in trouble, while Kerry's good turn for Bridget creates an awkward situation. Starring Katey Sagal and David Spade.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: The school's new sniffer dog finds Kerry's marijuana, and Bridget is brought home by the police for not wearing a helmet while riding her boyfriend's motorcycle.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael receives advice from Junior on how to handle Janet's office persona, while Claire tries to convince Kady that ET is not as scary as she thinks.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Junior takes an IQ test that leaves his parents convinced he is a genius, although his impressive scores turn out to be a mistake. Kady makes career plans and starts exercising her authority round the house.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: The children tease Michael about his age, so he pretends he has injured his back to gain sympathy, and to shame them into being nice to him.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael tries to provide a confidence-booster for Jay, who is feeling inadequate following a meeting with a former cheerleader they knew at school. Meanwhile, Junior gets trapped in the girls' locker room. American comedy, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: The Kyle and Tyler families compete against each nother in a bowling tournament, and Junior develops a crush on his opponents' daughter.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael takes Junior for a driving lesson, but when the pair get stopped by the police it seems that Michael's own licence has expired. Damon Wayans stars.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part one of two. Janet turns down the chance to go to a concert because it clashes with her 15th wedding anniversary, and makes the kids spy on Michael to ensure he is planning something special.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Kyles' wedding anniversary arrives, but Michael upsets Jay by deciding to play golf instead of spending the day with her. However, he seems to have a surprise in store. Comedy, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.sub-title: The Kyles Go to Hawaii - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of three. Michael and Jay go out for a romantic dinner, but both find it hard to resist temptation from members of the opposite sex. Meanwhile, Junior dates a local girl.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.sub-title: The Kyles Go to Hawaii - Part Three.
programme.desc: Part three of three. Michael finds out that the family's flight leaves much earlier than he thought, and Junior insists on staying behind with his new love Leilani.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: High Court enforcement officers Paul Bohill and Steve and Ben Pinner face their biggest eviction yet - taking on squatters in a large central London office block. With the help of the police, they try to remove a suspected group of 70 from the building, but with a barricade in place, the team faces a challenging operation ahead. Elsewhere, officers are confronted by an army of family and friends when they attempt to enforce a writ at the property of a debtor, and face a difficult eviction at the north London home of a heavily pregnant tenant and her family, after the council fails to pay the rent to the landlord.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: High Court enforcement officers Paul and Steve make an extraordinary discovery inside a locked bedroom, and immediately call for police back-up. Brian and Graham head to Swindon Town football club to recover a debt, while Paul and Ben have difficulty evicting a couple from a house in Kent after learning they have six children and nowhere else to go.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary giving an insight into cash-strapped Britain from the perspectives of debtors, creditors and those who collect the payments, including High Court enforcement bailiffs and repossession teams. The series follows each case as it unfolds, recording the thoughts and feelings on both sides, the process of repossession and the impact it has on all involved.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Brian O'Shaughnessy and Graham Aldred's first case sees them in a Brighton health spa as they search for assets to seize in pursuit of a £20,000 debt. Following a stand-off, they devise a way to work with the owner and her professional advisers to come up with a solution. Later, Graham reveals his softer side when he revisits a woman who defaulted on a debt payment plan.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Bargain Barbie and Desperate Dole Claimants.
programme.desc: Job-seekers whose benefits have been reduced by the Government, including Doncaster single mum Sammy who has had her income support cut by 20 per cent after missing a job centre appointment. Former security guard Brian from Gateshead had to leave his job due to poor health - only to have his benefits lowered when he was told he was not doing enough to find work. Bradford ex-con Anthony moved into a new flat - but could not afford a bed, cooker or washing machine - while in Stockton-on-Tees, mum-of-three Simone stripped off in protest when her sister's dole was cut.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Life on the Dole.
programme.desc: The documentary about living on benefits meets people struggling to survive island life. They include Tina, who is struggling to cope on the Isle of Sheppey in Kent - despite turning her life around and kicking her heroin habit, she is now finding life on the island tough thanks to her mobility problems. Single parent Matt lives in Cowes on the Isle of Wight, where the lack of jobs makes life a constant struggle, while Chrissy on Canvey Island in Essex is refusing to pay her rent as she believes her home is not up to scratch. As a result, however, she is facing eviction.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth Prison
programme.desc: Franky is back behind bars but determined to prove her innocence regarding Mike Penissi's murder. There is so much circumstantial evidence against her, it will be far from easy.(n)

programme.title: Extraordinary People
programme.sub-title: The World's Heaviest Child: Extraordinary People.
programme.desc: The story of 11-year-old Arya Permana from Indonesia, who weighs a massive 30 stone - nearly three times that of an average man. His status as the world's heaviest boy has brought fame and considerable financial benefits - but when he becomes house-bound and his health begins to deteriorate, his parents realise they must seek medical help. Can the doctors' tests get to the root cause of the boy's extraordinary weight gain?.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman has nightmares depicting him as Brad Pitt in World War Z - and all hell breaks loose in the town when he starts acting on them.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Goth Kids 3: Dawn of the Posers.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ike starts going through puberty and causes Kyle a huge amount of grief - until a Yo Gabba Gabba-style intervention saves the day.(n)

programme.title: You're the Worst
programme.desc: Jimmy suspects Gretchen is having an affair, Lindsay wrestles with the simple tasks that her ex-husband used to do for her, and Edgar has some advice for his improv teacher.(n)

programme.title: Idiotsitter
programme.desc: Billie's mum sets her up on a blind date with a biker, while Gene's mother Diane resurfaces, but is now known as Dan after transitioning to a man.(n)

programme.title: The Magicians
programme.desc: A college graduate's university interview takes a bizarre turn when he finds a hidden portal to a school of magic and before he knows it he has been enrolled in Brakebills College of Magical Pedagogy. But as he settles into his new life, his old friends struggle with the change and he receives an ominous warning. Fantasy drama based on the award-winning novels by Lev Grossman, starring Jason Ralph, Arjun Gupta and Hale Appleman.(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Kitty hires Leo and his cousin to redecorate the basement, Fez takes up ballet to improve his love life, and Donna and Eric have an argument. Comedy, starring Wilmer Valderrama and Debra Jo Rupp.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules

programme.title: Baby Ballroom
programme.desc: Warren Bullock heads to a rock pub to give the locals a lesson in line dancing, and some of the dancers take a trip to the ballet to meet classically trained ballerina Simone Sault.(n)

Disaster movie, starring Kit Harington, Emily Browning, Carrie-Anne Moss and Kiefer Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: Imported by the Army for an early a.m. radio show, Cronauer blasts the formerly staid, sanitized airwaves with a constant barrage of rapid-fire humor and the hottest hits from back home. The G.I.s love him but the brass is up in arms!(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, the rebel learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect the King's throne. The outlaw counts upon the support of his band of followers, including his Moorish companion, a drunken priest and the beautiful Maid Marian(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: In debt to a gangster, petty criminal Gerard Butler pulls off a heist that has repercussions in the underworld. Guy Ritchie caper. Strong language/violence/mature themes. (2008)(110 mins)(n)

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: Two longtime friends take stock of their accomplished artistic careers in this meditative drama written and directed by Paolo Sorrentino. Michael Caine stars as Fred Ballinger, a retired composer who, at the behest of his daughter (Rachel Weisz), is on vacation in the Alps with his friend Mick Boyle (Harvey Keitel), a filmmaker currently working on a new project. Fred believes he is enjoying his retirement, but he is soon approached with an offer of a British knighthood if he'll conduct a performance of a famous piece he wrote(n)

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: Emotional docudrama about terminally ill New Jersey police officer Laurel Hester, whose 2005 legal battle for the right to pass her pension benefits on to her female life partner became an equal-rights milestone(n)

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Danish painter Einar Wegener begins living as a woman named Lili Elbe, and undergoes one of the world's first gender-reassignment surgeries in the 1930s. Lili struggles with her new identity as it strains her marriage to artist Gerda Wegener(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Taut drama about an ambitious young stockbroker who is seduced by money and power when he hooks up with a high-powered company trader. But he faces a crisis of conscience when he discovers the truth behind the trader's bid to buy up an airline for which his father is a union rep. Michael Douglas won an Oscar for Best Actor for his portrayal of Gordon Gekko - the personification of 80s greed(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: The creation of one of the most memorable books of the 1960s -- and the impact the writing and research would have on its author -- is explored in this drama based on a true story. In 1959, Truman Capote (played by Philip Seymour Hoffman) was a critically acclaimed novelist who had earned a small degree of celebrity for his work when he read a short newspaper item about a multiple murder in a small Kansas town. For some reason, the story fascinated Capote, and he asked William Shawn (Bob Balaban), his editor at The New Yorker, to let him write a piece about the case. Capote had long believed that in the right hands, a true story could be molded into a tale as compelling as any fiction, and he believed this event, in which the brutal and unimaginable was visited upon a community where it was least expected, could be just the right material. Capote traveled to Kansas with his close friend Harper Lee (Catherine Keener), herself becoming a major literary figure with the success of To Kill a Mockingbird, and while Capote's effete and mannered personal style stuck out like a sore thumb in Kansas, in time he gained the trust of Alvin Dewey (Chris Cooper), the Kansas Bureau of Investigation agent investigating the murder of the Clutter family, and with his help Capote's magazine piece grew into a full-length book. Capote also became familiar with the petty criminals who killed the Clutter family, Dick Hickock (Mark Pellegrino) and Perry Smith (Clifton Collins Jr.), and in Smith he found a troubling kindred spirit more like himself than he wanted to admit. After attaining a sort of friendship with Smith under the assumption that the man would be executed before the book was ever published, Capote finds himself forced to directly confront the moral implications of his actions with regards to both his role in the man's death, and the way that he would be remembered. Capote also co-stars Bruce Greenwood as Capote's longtime companion Jack Dunphy, and Amy Ryan as Mary Dewey, Alvin's wife who became a confidante of Capote's(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Set in the Depression of the '30s in southern United States, this drama portrays the remarkable relationship established between Paul Edgecomb (Tom Hanks), a prison guard on Death Row, and John Coffey (Michael Clarke Duncan), a hefty colored man sentenced to death for a brutal double homicide. As the days go by, and after some surprising experiences, Edgecomb begins to have doubts about Coffey's culpability. He is a naïve, apprehensive man with a supernatural gift. Based on a novel by Stephen King, this drama received four Oscar nominations(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: FedEx employee Chuck Noland lives his life by clockwork. But his promise to his girlfriend to be back from Moscow for New Year looks doubtful when a terrifying plane crash strands him in the middle of the Pacific. An elemental drama of hope and survival(n)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: Three masked intruders terrorise a young couple in a secluded country house(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: LA journalist Steve Lopez begins writing a column about a mentally ill homeless man with a talent for playing the cello. Lopez tries to help improve his life, but finds his new friend's state of mind a stumbling block. Drama(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: When war veteran Colonel Terry Childers is hung out to dry by military chiefs, he turns to an old friend, army lawyer Colonel Hayes Hodges. Drama(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: Doses of radiation turn a mild-mannered scientist into an angry, uncontrollable monstrosity in this adaptation of the Marvel Comics series. Lou Ferrigno, who played the Hulk in the 1970s TV series, has a cameo as a security guard and provides the voice of the Hulk(n)

programme.title: Hamlet 2
programme.desc: Steve Coogan stars in the comedy Hamlet 2, which follows a drama teacher who tries to put together a production of "Hamlet 2" to rescue his high-school theater department. Catherine Keener co-stars in the Andrew Fleming-helmed production(n)

programme.title: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Bobby and Peter Farrelly co-directed this irreverent comedy about conjoined twins. Greg Kinnear and Matt Damon star as Walt and Bob, brothers who literally stick together through thick and thin. That bond is tested, however, when Walt becomes an actor in Hollywood(n)

programme.title: The Rocker
programme.desc: The Office star Rainn Wilson portrays a drummer named "Fish," who gets a second shot at fame 20 years after getting kicked out of his band on the very night they signed the record contract that made them stars. Fish has spent the past two decades languishing at soul-crushing day jobs while his old bandmates became legends, continuing to grace magazine covers and dominate the radio. He might just get another chance at musical success, however, when his teenage cousin invites him to drum for his high school garage band, and they end up catching the ear of record executives. Now, Fish is determined to live the hedonistic rock & roll lifestyle he missed out on 20 years ago, but his new bandmates don't appreciate his hard partying -- and neither do his middle-aged knees. This Fox Atomic comedy co-stars Christina Applegate. Shawn Levy (Night at the Museum) and Tom McNulty co-produced the feature, which was penned by Wallace Wolodarsky and Maya Forbes, and directed by Peter Cattaneo (Opal Dream)(n)

programme.title: Last Orders
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Graham Swift, this is the story of a group of friends come together to mourn the death of Jack Dodds, who last request was to have his ashes thrown off of Margate Pier(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Mark Steven Johnson's violent superhero fantasy-morality play stars Ben Affleck as Matt Murdock, a guilt-wracked blind vigilante with a penchant for red leather. During his childhood, an accident involving toxic waste blinded Murdock, but it also enhanced his other senses and gave him a kind of 'radar vision'. The incident was partially caused by his discovery that his father was involved with the Mob. Now, the adult Murdock, spurred partly by Catholic guilt over his role in his father's death, has dedicated this life to fighting crime and protecting the innocent. By day Murdock's a defence lawyer, but by night he dispenses summary justice to criminals who've escaped the courts. Things get complicated when he falls in love with Elektra Natchios (Jennifer Garner). Not only is she the daughter of a man with connections to New York crime bosses but, unknown to Murdock, she's also a vigilante who's equally keen on figure-hugging leather (black in her case). And when Daredevil is framed for the murder of her father, Elektra swears vengeance on the masked crime-fighter (not realising that he's her lover). Meanwhile, both of them are in mortal danger from the actual killer, a merciless Irish assassin called Bullseye (Colin Farrell)(n)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror about a half-human, half-alien female mutant who escapes from a government laboratory and attempts to prolong the life of her species by mating with a human. Pursued by scientists and police, she passes through a chrysalid stage and takes on the appearance of a beautiful young woman. But she can also metamorphose from her eye-catching form into a repulsive, death-dealing monster(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: To clear his criminal record a former LA cop must infiltrate the Miami street racing scene to set up a drug baron. Burning rubber all over the city with his ex-con friend, he attempts to deliver the crook to the FBI without crashing and being blown to pieces in one of the many explosions(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: The true story of one of America's most violent and infamous gangsters, Whitey Bulger. Johnny Depp stars as Bulger, who was the brother of a state senator and was eventually convinced to wear a wire for the FBI to bring down the Italian mafia in Boston after they invaded his territory. Scott Cooper directs, with Mark Mallouk penning the screenplay based on Dick Lehr and Gerald O'Neill's 2001 best-seller Black Mass: The True Story of An Unholy Alliance Between The FBI and The Irish Mob(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In a grim near future, weighed down by economic chaos and high unemployment, criminals on death row race armoured cars for the entertainment of the public. The death rate is high, but the winner can earn his freedom. One such con is persuaded to race in the masked guise of a popular champion, but he begins to worry that an anonymous driver is unlikely to win this gladiatorial game(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: A convicted murderer released early from jail is found mauled to death by a bear in the woods and Walt has to open a murder investigation when the man is discovered to have been sedated and baited with steak. Meanwhile, Branch has to deal with his gun-toting uncle causing trouble at his retirement home. Guest starring Peter Weller (RoboCop, 24), who also directed the episode.(n)

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: Walt and Vic try to untangle a complex web of passion to find out who put a rodeo sponsor in a coma and stole one of his paintings. The prime suspect is a rider who recently had his funding cut amid accusations he was using a cattle prod to agitate the horses. But who was having an affair with the victim? And was the artwork worthless - or priceless? Guest starring Stacy Haiduk (The Young and the Restless).(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A government weapons truck is hijacked as part of a plan to allow a dangerous criminal to escape from jail. Two officers are killed, but as Horatio tries to prevent further carnage and rescue a hostage, it is the members of his own team who find themselves in the line of fire. David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Delko is rushed to hospital with potentially fatal gunshot wounds, and Horatio waits anxiously as medics try to revive him, while the rest of the team searches for his assailant. Calleigh and Ryan process the crime scene, and question a security guard who provides them with what appears to be vital information - until further evidence sheds new light on the case.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Old Fashioned Murder
programme.desc: A woman who has devoted her life to running her family's museum is outraged when her brother decides to sell it. Knowing of someone with criminal connections, she arranges to have her brother killed. However, just when she starts to think she has got away with it, a certain shabby sleuth is assigned to the case. Crime drama, with Peter Falk, Joyce Van Patten, Celeste Holm and Tim O'Connor.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Try and Catch Me
programme.desc: A grieving crime writer blames her niece's husband for her death and concocts a plan to take revenge, luring him to her walk-in vault, before locking him in and leaving him to die. She then puts her knowledge of the criminal mind to good use by covering her tracks, and although Columbo strongly suspects foul play, he finds clues are thin on the ground. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk and Ruth Gordon.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: A Bird in the Hand
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with a mountain of debts comes up with a plan to make some easy money. He plants a bomb under his wealthy uncle's car in the hope of inheriting a large legacy - but a hit-and-run driver jeopardises the entire scheme and Columbo is soon sniffing around for clues. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Tyne Daly, Greg Evigan and Don S Davis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride joins forces with an old Navy friend who has been given a lethal dose of polonium. Dr Gabriel Lin (guest star BD Wong) is all too aware that he has little time to live, but is determined to catch his killer. When the same radioactive substance is discovered on a water bottle that Gabriel's brother is about to drink, it appears that both siblings might be in the killer's sights. With Scott Bakula and Lucas Black.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Brody is assigned to the security detail for the Vice Chief of Naval Operations. However, when the group arrives at its destination, a sniper fires. The admiral is saved, but fellow agent Austin Hackett dies. While Pride and his team try to find the shooter, security team leader Ryan Anson places Brody under investigation, questioning her competence. Meanwhile, Lund recreates the shooting and comes to the realisation that Hackett did not give his life to save the admiral - because he was never the target.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the disappearance of photographer Martin Roe, who was due to testify at an army first lieutenant's court-martial after he captured a picture of what appeared to be a soldier killing an unarmed civilian. However, the photograph is leaked, and Roe is later found dead with a needle in his arm.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Having returned home to Chicago, Mac finally realises his stalker's motivation and identity. In his absence, Stella leads the team to the subway where a train driver has been murdered. However, this crime turns out to be another message from the killer and part of a long-term plan inspired by his desire for revenge. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Stella, Flack and Lindsay suspect a joke-shop owner known as Laughing Larry was somehow complicit in the murder of an extravagant internet entrepreneur killed by an exploding cigar. Meanwhile, Danny is devastated by the death of a neighbour who was shot during a robbery at a grocery store. Drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team retraces the final hours of a murdered 16-year-old girl and discover she was pregnant. As the investigation continues, a second death occurs - and their findings have devastating repercussions for two families. Drama, guest starring Jane Seymour, with Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A bystander is killed in a robbery, traumatising his mentally ill wife, who is later suspected of physically abusing their child. The police take the youngster into protective custody, but a lack of evidence forces them to return him home - with tragic consequences. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The body of a teenage girl is found in the boot of a car, and inquiries soon establish she was a bully who enjoyed picking on other girls - leaving Stabler and Benson with a seemingly endless list of suspects to choose from. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a six-year-old boy who is believed to have collapsed during an exorcism at a late-night church service. However, forensics reveal the victim was smothered before the rite took place, casting suspicion on his foster parents and social worker. Starring Christopher Meloni, Ice-T and Richard Belzer.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The police discover a 12-year-old boy posted sinister threats to a girl in an internet chatroom and suspect his anger stems from sexual abuse. The trail soon leads Benson and Stabler to a billionaire known for his generous donations to charities and his hospitality to young house guests.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The author is forced to go on the run after being framed for the murder of a woman employed by insurance broker Lloyd Kurtzman. With evidence of his innocence in short supply and startling revelations coming to light, Beckett begins questioning how well she knows him. Drama, starring Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a clothes shop owner during an apparent robbery. An open lock suggests someone who works there was responsible, and the trail eventually leads to the son of the dead man's business partner, whose shady dealings were at risk of being exposed. However, the suspect flees to Israel before police have a chance to question him.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a white police officer, and the trail ultimately leads to a former black rights activist. As the trial gets under way, racial tensions in the city are inflamed with the emergence of evidence linking the dead man to several white supremacist organisations. McCoy realises whichever verdict is returned, it is guaranteed to be greeted with public outrage.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Flack looks into the death of a paintballer who was seemingly murdered when his killer swapped harmless ammunition for real bullets. The prime suspect turns out to be a rival who was competing with the victim for a sponsorship deal, but finding him is no easy matter. Meanwhile, Stella tells Mac she thinks she is being stalked. Forensic drama, starring Gary Sinise, Eddie Cahill and Melina Kanakaredes.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Hetty confronts Alexa Comescu and tells her Callen is dead, but the crime boss knows she is lying. Meanwhile, the agents search for their leader in Romania hoping to confirm she is alive, but when they mount a rescue attempt one of the team is shot. Real-time episode of the crime drama, starring Linda Hunt, Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The author investigates when a senior lawyer who specialised in divorces is killed with an icepick. Meanwhile, his ex-wife, Meredith, moves into the loft to take care of Alexis while she recovers from illness. American crime drama, starring Nathan Fillion, Molly Quinn and Darby Stanchfield.(n)

programme.title: Person of Interest
programme.desc: The Machine disgorges the social security number of upmarket hypnotherapist Hayden Price and Finch books an appointment to see him, soon realising that the man is not only unlicensed, but also a con artist and thief. Meanwhile, Carter is still pursuing her plan to expose HR and tries to protect Laskey when Simmons and Terney ask him to kill a money launderer. Crime drama, guest-starring Aaron Staton (Mad Men).(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.sub-title: Swept Away - A Very Special Episode.
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the suspicious death of a reality TV contestant. They discover the show's producers had been provoking bad feeling toward the dead man among his fellow participants, while a cameraman reveals that his last moments were captured on film. However, the incriminating tape cannot be found. Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green have difficulty pinning the death of a strangled woman on their prime suspect, drug dealer Francis `Taz' Partell. However, while questioning one of his former associates, they discover new evidence indicating he was responsible for another murder in the Bronx.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team are called to a deaf family's home, where a woman has been shot and killed - a case that brings up memories of Lindsay's troubled past. Meanwhile, Stella and Danny investigate the murder of a promising figure-skater who has been found dead at the ice rink - and come to suspect she was not the intended target. Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Anna Belknap star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam goes undercover as a bomb specialist when he investigates the death of a demolition expert, killed while driving the car of a notorious club owner. However, he faces a race against time to find explosives located across LA. Meanwhile, Callen learns more about his past and Hunter decides to reshuffle her team.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates when a reporter is murdered as she prepares to break a story about a mysterious Libyan freedom fighter named El-Libi. The activist is wanted by the country's government after establishing `radio free Libya' in the aftermath of Gaddafi's closure of the internet. Meanwhile, more details of Callen's past begin to emerge.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Director Vance charges DiNozzo with a special assignment to go to France, locate Admiral Kendall's wayward daughter Amanda and bring her home. Arriving in Marseille, Tony immediately heads to the local NCIS office, only to find five dead agents. After eventually tracking down Amanda, the pair embark on a rollercoaster ride to the relative safety of the nearest NCIS office in Spain. Michael Weatherly stars.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney is found strangled in his car in an area notorious for prostitution. Benson is shocked to realise she briefly dated the victim and refuses to believe he would have paid for sex. As investigations get under way, DNA evidence reveals the dead man might have been gay. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The rape and murder of a criminology student puts detectives Stabler and Benson on the trail of a killer with an expert knowledge of forensics. A discovery about the victim's mentor places him at the top of their list of suspects - but as further evidence is gathered, it begins to seem that someone might have tried to frame him for the crime.(n)

He becomes Nacho and, with his tag partner Esqueleto aka The Skeleton (Héctor Jiménez), begins to fight his way to the top and take a crack at the arrogant Ramses (Cesar Gonzalez). Ana de la Reguera plays Sister Encarnación, after whom Ignacio lusts in a platonic way, but the bulk of the film largely concerns men in tights and their frantic efforts in the ring(n)

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Mummy's Dummies. This time we're in ancient Egypt, where the Three Stooges own a used-chariot dealership ("I'm Honest Moe, he's Honest Shemp, and that's...that's Larry"). When they bamboozle the Captain of the Royal Guard (Ralph Dunn) out of 400 shekels for a defective chariot, the Stooges are arrested and brought before the mighty King Rootentooten (Vernon Dent). Sentenced to be thrown to the crocodiles, the boys save themselves by curing the King's toothache, whereupon they are appointed Royal Chamberlains--and in this capacity, our heroes expose a crooked tax collector (Philip Van Zandt). Highlights include Shemp's disguise as the mummy of the late, great King Put-n-take-it(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: John Milius's jingoistic direction and pulpy screenplay fit perfectly into this film version of the Robert E. Howard fantasy story of the sword and sorcery hero, Conan the Barbarian. Complementing Mulius's heavy metal production is Arnold Schwarzenegger's leaden acting, which in any other context would be deadly, but here (as in The Terminator) corresponds nicely with the whole sonorous project. The story begins when a horde of rampaging warriors massacre the parents of young Conan and enslave the young child for years on The Wheel of Pain. The Wheel of Pain seems to have as its only purpose the building up of Conan's muscles, so it's no surprise that one day Conan grows up to become Arnold Schwarzenegger. As the sole survivor of the childhood massacre, Conan is released from slavery and taught the ancient arts of fighting. Transforming himself into a killing machine, Conan travels into the wilderness to seek vengeance on Thulsa Doom (James Earl Jones), the man responsible for killing his family. In the wilderness, Conan takes up with the thieves Valeria (Sandahl Bergman) and Subota (Gerry Lopez). The trio comes upon a weird snake cult, linked to Doom, and Conan wants to trek off to Doom's mountain retreat to kill him. But he is prevented from doing that by King Osrik (Max Von Sydow), who wants the trio of warriors to help rescue his daughter who has joined Doom in the hills(n)

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: A bitter Vietnam veteran snaps when he is goaded by a small-town sheriff, and goes to explosive lengths to get revenge. Action(n)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: A former GI war veteran rampages through Southeast Asia hunting for POWs(n)

programme.title: Tombstone
programme.desc: Legendary lawman Wyatt Earp begins cleaning up the town of Tombstone, Arizona, but when he clashes with local outlaws the Clantons, the scene is set for one of the most famous battles in the history of the Wild West(n)

programme.title: Better Call Saul
programme.desc: Expenses. Jimmy attempts to settle his debts; Nacho reunites with an old acquaintance; and Mike helps Stacey with a project and makes a meaningful connection(n)

programme.title: Better Call Saul
programme.desc: Slip. Jimmy is pushed to desperate measures; Nacho picks up a new skill; Mike explores an alliance; and Kim stands up to Hamlin(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes
programme.desc: Tom Witzky is a regular guy whose life is turned upside down after he is hypnotised by his sister-in-law. Suddenly, his ordinary life is invaded with violent flashes of horrific images he cannot explain(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood returns as Dirty Harry Callahan in this fast-paced action thriller. San Francisco police inspector Harry Callahan's success has earned him celebrity status . . . and someone is killing celebrities. Now Dirty Harry will be the next victim if he doesn't find a serial murderer before he strikes again(n)

programme.title: The Glimmer Man
programme.desc: Two cops with almost nothing in common find themselves brought together to capture a psychotic murderer in this action thriller. They must work together to solve a chain of mysterious killings by a killer nicknamed "The Family Man" for his habit of dispatching entire households at once(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Everyone knows it takes an Undercover Brother to foil The Man. This time, The Man has launched Operation Whitewash, a plot to undermine an African-American general's presidential ambitions. But with the Undercover Brother (Eddie Griffin) on the case, alongside his sexy sidekick, Sistah Girl (Aunjanue Ellis), the general is sure to see the inside of the Oval Office. The 70's fashion-fabulous duo dons the latest in country club attire to infiltrate The Man's plan and root out his evil accomplice the White She Devil (Denise Richards)(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Sugar
programme.desc: Filmmakers Ryan Fleck and Anna Boden (Half Nelson) weave this introspective sports drama concerning a talented Dominican baseball player who longs to break into the American big league and earn the money needed to support his impoverished family. Miguel Santos is a talented pitcher who might just have what it takes to earn a prized spot on a Major League Baseball team, but before that happens he'll have to prove his worth in the minor leagues. Advancing into the United States' minor league system at the tender age of 19, Miguel is warmly welcomed into the small-town Iowa home of his host family, but can't help but struggle with language and cultural barriers despite the kindness of strangers. Subsequently forced to reevaluate his life's ambition after his once-trusty arm becomes unreliable, the previously single-minded pitcher gradually begins to question both the world he lives in and the role he has chosen to play in it(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalise Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Mark Steven Johnson's violent superhero fantasy-morality play stars Ben Affleck as Matt Murdock, a guilt-wracked blind vigilante with a penchant for red leather. During his childhood, an accident involving toxic waste blinded Murdock, but it also enhanced his other senses and gave him a kind of 'radar vision'. The incident was partially caused by his discovery that his father was involved with the Mob. Now, the adult Murdock, spurred partly by Catholic guilt over his role in his father's death, has dedicated this life to fighting crime and protecting the innocent. By day Murdock's a defence lawyer, but by night he dispenses summary justice to criminals who've escaped the courts. Things get complicated when he falls in love with Elektra Natchios (Jennifer Garner). Not only is she the daughter of a man with connections to New York crime bosses but, unknown to Murdock, she's also a vigilante who's equally keen on figure-hugging leather (black in her case). And when Daredevil is framed for the murder of her father, Elektra swears vengeance on the masked crime-fighter (not realising that he's her lover). Meanwhile, both of them are in mortal danger from the actual killer, a merciless Irish assassin called Bullseye (Colin Farrell)(n)

programme.title: Manhunter
programme.desc: Dark thriller about an ex-FBI forensic investigator who is called in to track down a brutal serial killer known as 'the Tooth Fairy'. To help him understand the mind of his quarry, he visits the prison which holds an old adversary of his - notorious serial killer Dr Hannibal 'the Cannibal' Lektor. But the investigation comes to threaten his sanity and the lives of his family(n)

programme.title: Half Past Dead
programme.desc: Steven Seagal stars in this explosive thriller as an undercover FBI agent trying to infiltrate a powerful crime syndicate. He goes above and beyond the call of duty when he lands in prison, where he also works to thwart an inside job to steal millions of dollars in lost gold. Ja Rule, Morris Chestnut, Nia Peeples, Kurupt, Tony Plana, Matt Battaglia, Stephen J. Cannell, Richard Bremmer(n)

programme.desc: When war veteran Colonel Terry Childers is hung out to dry by military chiefs, he turns to an old friend, army lawyer Colonel Hayes Hodges. Drama(n)

Callahan begins to investigate the murders despite the orders of his superior officer, Lieutenant Briggs. A man has to know his limitations..(n)

programme.desc: An Interpol agent undertakes a mission to recover a deadly weapon of mass destruction(n)

programme.title: Hoosiers

programme.title: Bean

The story begins as Bean arrives in Los Angeles to guard a famous painting, but as he is unfit for any physical task, everything goes hilariously wrong. A master of physical comedy, Atkinson pits the British Bean against his suspicious American hosts in a culture clash that makes for sidesplitting comedy(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Johnsons set out from California for a family reunion in Missouri. The parents are split up, the kids are arguing - can everyone keep it together for the big day?(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a group of extreme athletes who are using their specialized skills to pull off a series of complex crimes. Remake of the 1991 cult hit of the same name(n)

programme.title: Sudden Impact

programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul (Ethan Hawke), headed to Mexico with his faithful collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: Distant War (September 1939 - May 1940). This video is part two in the 26-volume World at War series that chronicles the history of World War II. Hosted by Laurence Olivier, the programs were originally televised on Sunday evenings in 1974. This episode focuses on the German advance on Poland and Norway from September, 1939, through May, 1940. The English and French, still untouched by war in their own lands, gather their forces(n)

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: France Falls (May - June 1940). This video is part three in the 26-volume World at War series that chronicles the history of World War II. These historic television broadcasts originally appeared on Sunday evenings in 1974. This episode follows the advance of Hitler's army into France in May and June of 1940, and its frightening march into Paris. England stood alone in Europe against the German army. Meanwhile, Russian troops were occupying Poland and the Balkan states(n)

programme.desc: American Killers. Extreme angler Jeremy Wade travels around the globe searching for fresh water monsters. In this episode, he travels to the USA after hearing stories of corpses in the waters in some of the country's tourist hotspots. Are they true or are they just myth? He meets people who have encountered this beast and hears tales of a killer catfish. Jeremy even considers using himself as human bait such is his determination to discover the truth behind these stories(n)

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Face Ripper. Angler Jeremy Wade investigates the story of a man who had his face ripped off in a remote Bolivian river, leading to a confrontation with one of his oldest adversaries. Jeremy's initial thought is that it was the work of piranhas, but they rarely attack unless threatened in some way. A chat with the surgeon who performed the post-mortem on the victim changes his mind. Then an interview with someone who witnessed the attack reveals it was a Red Bellied Piranha - but why the change in the creature's behaviour? Is there another predator in the river system threatening the piranhas?(n)

programme.desc: Scared to Laugh. Symone is already an aggressive cat, but the sound of Kelly laughing or crying launches her into an attack. Can she be coached to become immune to Kelly's cackling?(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops: Houston
programme.desc: Saved From Misery. Houston SPCA Investigator Stephen Goldman rescues a miniature horse. Elsewhere, two abandoned dogs run loose(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops: Houston
programme.desc: Triumph Over Adversity. Investigator Stephen Goldman receives a call about a dog stuck in a fence. When he gets there, he finds the dog is so starved it's unable to walk(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Cut Loose. It's a race against time as Tia and the crew search for a mother pit bull and her puppies that have been dumped in the sweltering Mojave Desert; will they find them?(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Don't Blow It. A parolee must be careful not to squander his opportunity for redemption; a potential adopter falls for a dog that was rescued in Mississippi(n)

programme.title: Finding Bigfoot
programme.sub-title: The Best Little Bigfoot in Texas
programme.desc: The Best Little Bigfoot in Texas. The team return to Texas to examine new evidence of a trackway they believe may have been made by a juvenile Bigfoot(n)

programme.title: Finding Bigfoot
programme.desc: Squatchploitation. The team returns to Bigfoot hot spot, Caddo Lake, where they meet with witnesses and finally head out on an eventful night investigation on the bayou(n)

programme.title: Finding Bigfoot
programme.desc: A Squatch in the Ozarks. A search for the Blue Man is conducted in the Ozark Mountains on a trip that includes an enthusiastic town-hall meeting and an eventful final night(n)

programme.title: Finding Bigfoot

programme.title: Finding Bigfoot

programme.title: Mountain Monsters: Bigfoot Files

programme.title: Mountain Monsters: Bigfoot Files
programme.desc: West Virginian Vampire. The team travel to Putnam County, W.V., hoping to catch a creature known as the West Virginia Vampire(n)

programme.title: Mountain Monsters: Bigfoot Files
programme.desc: Hunt for the Kentucky Wildman. Eastern Kentucky is visited by the investigators as they search for what is rumored to be a dangerous and aggressive creature known as the Wildman. Included: They attempt to track down a missing eyewitness; and later, make a large, strong trap(n)

programme.title: Mountain Monsters: Bigfoot Files
programme.desc: Lincoln Hellhound. The investigators return to Lincoln County, W.Va., in pursuit of a hellhound that evaded capture on their last visit(n)
