programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Zeg finds a tiny dinosaur egg, and decides to return it to its Truckodactyl mother, so he, Blaze and AJ set out on an exciting journey across a prehistoric landscape.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Popping Balloons.
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are each given a colourful balloon at the end of Smartysaurus's party, but when a number of balloons start bursting, Noddy tries to find out why.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: When Sam the seal wants to learn how to dance, Wissper helps by asking natural mover Stripes the tiger to teach him.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.sub-title: Daisy and Poppy's Trip to the Museum.
programme.desc: Daisy and Poppy cause chaos during a trip to a museum.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: When the girls bake magical flying cookies, Zeta and Nazboo sneak into their palace to steal the flying flour.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.sub-title: I Want to Be a Nurse.
programme.desc: Maid falls ill, giving Princess the chance to play nurse and come up with lots of ways to make her patient feel better.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The piglet and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's school.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and the family try to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks block the way.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: King Thistle decides that Gaston should have a birthday party after finding out he has never had one before.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A mysterious man visits April on Hallowe'en and shows an interest in a hideous six-armed idol that is capable of invoking a horde of criminal imps.(n)

programme.title: Cats Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos, including cats playing musical instruments, dressed in costumes and riding on vacuum cleaners. Narrated by Iain Lee, with commentary by Susan Calman.(n)

programme.title: The Gadget Show
programme.desc: The time has arrived for Georgie Barrat to see how far Monkey Tree FC have come from avoiding relegation, as she finds out which tech worked best - as well as deliver one final push. Jon Bentley pits the Amazon Echo against the Google Home to see how they match up to being a music player, personal assistant and home automation controller. In London, Ortis Deley gets the lowdown at the world's best virtual reality show. As well as the latest consumer gadgets, he visits a series of VR worlds that show how advanced technology will be used in the not-so-distant future.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Kev Salter goes on three drug busts, accompanied on two of them by newcomer Pete Tate, while Ben Sutcliffe shows presenter Rick Edwards the ropes, taking him on a fast-paced ride through Taser, method of entry and firearms training. Plus, a look back at two classic stories, showing the lengths to which people will go to hide their narcotics and how the police managed to gain access to a suspected drugs den.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Stu Chaney deals with an alleged assault and a missing crossbow, Amanda Stokes discovers crack on the A19 and Paul Faulkner apprehends a bloodied drunk driver hiding on a rooftop. A brand new patrol car takes a battering when Neil Armstrong helps manage the pursuit of a runaway MG.(n)

programme.title: Asteroid: Final Impact
programme.desc: A scientist exposes a plan to use his technology for government surveillance, but his whistle-blowing costs him everything. When he detects signs that the Earth is due to have a devastating collision with an asteroid, he is forced to become a fugitive to seek a way to save the world. Disaster movie, starring Mark Lutz, Anna Van Hooft and Emilie Ullerup.(n)

programme.title: 10.0 Earthquake
programme.desc: A fracking operation causes a series of earthquakes to hit Los Angeles. A scientist realises this is just a build-up to a larger quake that will destroy the whole city. Aided by a repentant fracking engineer, she tries to find a way to divert the seismic activity to an unpopulated area. Disaster movie, starring Cameron Richardson and Henry Ian Cusick. Includes 5 News Update at 4.20pm.(n)

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor. Edited for language. Includes 5 News Update at 6.05pm.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Jackie Chan's The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: An American teenager obsessed with kung fu movies is sent back in time to ancient China, where he joins the battle to free the imprisoned Monkey King. The only problem is he has no martial arts skills of his own, and will need the assistance of two legendary warriors to become the hero he needs to be. Martial arts adventure, starring Jet Li and Jackie Chan.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross is recruited by the CIA to recover a top-secret package, only to come to blows with a rival band of hired guns. Barney swears revenge when the other faction kill his protege, and leads his men on a mission to stop their enemies taking over a former Soviet nuclear facility. Action thriller sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone and Jean-Claude Van Damme. Includes 5 News Update at 11pm.(n)

programme.title: Greatest Ever Disaster Movies
programme.desc: Giles Coren presents the 40-film countdown as voted for by viewers of Channel 5 and readers of The Times, with contributions from actors including Robert Vaughn, George Kennedy and Ali Larter. Among those featured are the apocalyptic Reign of Fire, The Blob, which launched Steve McQueen's career and 1970s movies Earthquake, The Taking of Pelham One Two Three and Airport. Alive, Mars Attacks, Twister and Deep Impact also make the list, as do blockbusters The Day After Tomorrow and Armageddon, and another McQueen film in the form of The Towering Inferno, which also stars Paul Newman.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Top 20 Funniest
programme.desc: A countdown of the funniest video clips in America, from those that went viral to home movies, pranks, surveillance footage and news bloopers.(n)

programme.title: World's Most Pampered Pets
programme.desc: Part two of two. Following people who spoil their pets, including former TOWIE star Amy Childs, who takes her pug Prince shopping in Essex at her favourite pet boutique. Comedienne Shappi Khorsandi treats her rabbit to a royal grooming session, while New York-based journalist Dara Foster goes with her canine to Fetch Club, a disco for dogs. Plus, a look at Skunkfest masterminded by Deborah Cipriani, which is a yearly gathering for skunk lovers.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice and Alistair Appleton look back on more highlights. They recall a basement flat in Stoke Newington, north London, that was putting off potential buyers because of its dark rooms, out-of-date fixtures and general messiness, and remember a cramped cottage in Quorn, Leicestershire. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Angels of Jarm
programme.desc: Angel Ellie uses a song about burgers to show all meals are special.(n)

programme.title: Roary the Racing Car
programme.desc: Big Chris mistakes flags for oil rags.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Hatsie is too proud to ask for help when she gets stranded out at sea.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: Foxy rushes up to Mofy and Kerry with news that there is a stranger in the forest. Pre-school animation about a rabbit learning about emotions.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George play outside with their ball, but struggle to see each other in the long grass.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: Scruff finds a tiara and gives it to Princess, who is delighted - until she finds out that it belongs to Maid.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Cap'n Turbot's French cousin Francois tries to help get a picture of a rare blue-footed bird, but gets stuck on a cliff.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team create a soft play cafe for chef Tattie, but when Leo is asked to DJ at the opening, the extra responsibility distracts him from his job.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: After a misplaced football sets off the fire alarm in Dilys' shop, Norman pretends the device is faulty by setting it off again.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: The Fat Controller organises a party for Hiro at Knapford, but Thomas forgets to invite any guests.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: The girls explore an ice palace in their search for a magical gem.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Pink Lettuces.
programme.desc: When Smartysaurus reveals that she had a special request for pink paint, the Ninjas admit to turning the lettuces into pom-poms to cheer on Pink Ninja in her marathon attempt.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: The pups investigate when someone steals all the fish from the Flounder, and discover some lost penguins who need help getting home.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly invites Ben to join her at the annual royal fairy picnic.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Animation following the adventures of a dragon and his best friends. Digby feels down on Dragon Day as he cannot yet fly or breathe fire.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George eats his breakfast too quickly and gets hiccups.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa teases George for having a baby's tricycle, but then the other children point out that Peppa's own bike is not all that grown-up either.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: A kangaroo turns to Wissper for help when her joey will not leave the pouch.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: Alien tries to hide from his shadow, until Wanda explains what it is and that everyone has one.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Journalist and broadcaster Matthew Wright is joined by a panel of guests and the studio audience to debate the issues of the day.(n)

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi visits The Hotel Continental in Harwich, Essex, a quirky 14-bedroom hotel that overlooks the beach and boasts unique, individually designed rooms. However, a downturn in business in the area has resulted in a sharp decrease in bookings, leaving owners Gordon and Blossom Hoyles in dire financial straits due to huge debts and missed payments. When Alex arrives, she discovers that the creative couple are yet to face up to their predicament and she is forced to deliver her toughest advice.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Gareth and Craig investigate a possible case of mistaken identity in Shropshire, then in south Wales find themselves embroiled in a bitter dispute between two dog owners over a vet's bill. Steve and Phil have to evict a distraught young family from a former high street bank in west London, before paying a call on an elderly tailor in north London.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Roo tells James she is pregnant, while Kat and Ash move into the pier apartment and Brody demands that his family trust him, but gets into deep water with his dealer Zannis.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie attempts to put the pieces of his family back together, Ben is shocked to hear Elly's suspicions of Finn, and all hands are on deck to assist as Susan comes home.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ziva's family farm in Israel is devastated by an explosion, and the former NCIS agent is reported dead. Determined to seek justice, Tony ignores orders to stay off the case and sets out to track down Trent Kort, the British national and ex-CIA agent who remains the prime suspect. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Stolen from the Womb
programme.desc: A psychotic stalker gives a pregnant woman a labour-inducing drug, before kidnapping her newborn child. Thriller inspired by true events, starring Larisa Oleynik, Laura Mennell and Sebastian Spence.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie attempts to put the pieces of his family back together, Ben is shocked to hear Elly's suspicions of Finn, and all hands are on deck to assist as Susan comes home.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Roo tells James she is pregnant, while Kat and Ash move into the pier apartment and Brody demands that his family trust him, but gets into deep water with his dealer Zannis.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.desc: A party election broadcast by the Labour Party for the general election on Thursday.(n)

programme.title: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Documentary showing how CCTV and other technological advances are helping to bring car thieves to justice. Suspected criminals in Chester are involved in a high-speed chase through the city centre, and there is footage that helped put an end to one of London's most prolific gangs. The programme also includes film of a getaway in which robbers tried to evade the law by driving at 180mph.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jenno and Bucko race to assist when Jim is rammed by a runaway driver, while Dan and Gordy have to resort to physical force on a drunk who is menacing a family. Armed officers descend in numbers following reports of a gun on the motorway, and a have-a-go hero helps to tackle a runaway drug driver.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: New series. Emma Willis ushers in another diverse group of fame-seeking individuals who have been chosen to spend their summer invading the nation's living rooms. This year, the theme is `the United Kingdom of Big Brother - and everyone is welcome'. The housemates have been chosen from a range of backgrounds for what Channel 5 is describing as the ultimate social experiment - presumably to coincide with the headline events occurring this week in the real world.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.sub-title: Big Brother: Full House with Rylan.
programme.desc: New series. Rylan Clark-Neal presents the BB companion show, getting the audience's thoughts on the new housemates and the United Kingdom of Big Brother theme.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.sub-title: Big Brother: Live from the House.
programme.desc: New series. Coverage from the compound as the new housemates get to know one another and start to come to terms with being under constant surveillance as they are subjected to the first of many twists, turns and tasks from the ever-watchful Big Brother.(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: Based on a series of books by Patrick O'Brian, MASTER AND COMMANDER plunges viewers deep into the story of a British Navy ship at sea during the Napoleonic war. Russell Crowe stars as Aubrey, the charismatic captain who wrestles with issues like honour, pride, duty, sacrifice and loyalty while using ingenious tactics to engage his prey--a much larger and better-equipped French Man o' War. Paul Bettany plays his friend, the ship's doctor(n)

programme.title: Sunshine State
programme.desc: The residents of an oceanside Florida town are bemused by sharp-suited real estate developers. While some consider what they'll do with the pay-out, others fight to keep their place in the sun. Complex, multi-stranded drama(n)

programme.title: Sudden Impact
programme.desc: Magnum 44 thriller. In his fourth screen outing as 'Dirty' Harry Callahan, Clint Eastwood tracks down a rape victim who is killing off the men responsible(n)

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: Endlessly imitated, The Terminator made the reputation of cowriter/director James Cameron -- who would go on to make 1997's titanic Titanic -- and solidified the stardom of Arnold Schwarzenegger. The movie begins in a post-apocalyptic 2029, when Los Angeles has been largely reduced to rubble and is under the thumb of all-powerful ruling machines. Kyle Reese (Michael Biehn), a member of the human resistance movement, is teleported back to 1984. His purpose: to rescue Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton), the mother of the man who will lead the 21st-century rebels against the tyrannical machines, from being assassinated before she can give birth. Likewise thrust back to 1984 is The Terminator (Schwarzenegger), a grim, well-armed, virtually indestructable cyborg who has been programmed to eliminate Sarah Connor. After killing two "Sarah Connors" who turn out to be the wrong women, he finally aims his gunsights at the genuine article. This is the film in which Schwarzenegger declared "I'll be baaaack" -- and back he was, in "kinder and gentler" form, in the even more successful Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991)(n)

programme.title: Fido
programme.desc: This lively black comedy turns the zombie movie on its undead head. Billy Connolly is a howl as a zombie who's been domesticated to do work around a suburban couple's home, where he befriends their young son. All goes well until his electrified collar goes on the fritz and he reverts to his bloodthirsty, flesh-eating ways(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget action fantasy about the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. One man, who has become amphibious, tries to protect survivors on an artificial atoll made from scrap metal by taking on a gang of marauding pirates. He is also intent on discovering if there is any truth in the myth that there is still some land left above water(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Lone Survivor director Peter Berg helmed this docudrama about the Deepwater Horizon disaster, the 2010 oil-rig explosion in the Gulf of Mexico that resulted in the largest offshore oil spill in U.S. history. The film depicts the challenges that Mike Williams (Mark Wahlberg) and the rest of the rig's crew faced as they fought for survival. Kate Hudson, Kurt Russell, and John Malkovich co-star(n)

programme.title: Right at Your Door
programme.desc: Doomsday comes to LA in this gripping tale of terror, panic and paranoia. When dirty bombs are detonated over Southern California, a husband (Rory Cochrane) and his wife (Mary McCormack) become quarantined, he inside their house, she outside. As contaminated ash rains down from the sky, chaos reigns across the area as those left out in the open run the risk of being poisoned by the fatal toxins. The film is the directorial debut of production designer Chris Gorak, who also wrote the script(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In Washington, D.C., in the year 2054, murder has been eliminated. The future is seen and the guilty punished before the crime has ever been committed. From a nexus deep within the Justice Department's elite Precrime Unit, all the evidence to convict - from imagery alluding to the time, place and other details - is seen by Pre-Cogs, three psychic beings whose visions of murder have never been wrong. It is the nation's most advanced crime force, a perfect system. And no-one works harder for Precrime than its top man, Chief John Anderton. Destroyed by a tragic loss, Anderton has thrown all of his passion into a system that could potentially spare thousands of people from the tragedy he lived through. Six years later, the coming vote to take it national has only fuelled his conviction that Precrime works. Anderton has no reason to doubt it... until he becomes its #1 suspect(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: The tumultuous life of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risked her life's savings to produce and market her invention of the Miracle Mop. The success of that invention sparked her television-shopping business empire(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: SNL alumni Tina Fey and Amy Poehler co-star in this Universal Studios comedy about two daffy adult sisters, one an irresponsible single mom and the other a kindhearted nurse, who decide to throw one last wild party at their childhood home before it's sold by their parents. However, their bash ends up going disastrously awry. Written by Paula Pell and directed by Jason Moore(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Three men relive their carefree college years by killing off as many brain cells as possible in this hilarious comedy. Mitch (Luke Wilson) returns home from a less-than-pleasant business trip one evening to discover his wife, Heidi (Juliette Lewis), involved in a ménage à trois with two blindfolded strangers. Feeling less than welcome at home after this, Mitch rents a house near the campus of a nearby college; two of Mitch's old college buddies, Beanie (Vince Vaughn) and Frank (Will Ferrell). Starring Will Ferrell, Vince Vaughn, Luke Wilson & Juliette Lewis(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: A macho cop goes undercover as a schoolteacher as part of his efforts to prosecute an elusive drug dealer, but quickly finds out he's no match for a roomful of feisty 6-year-olds(n)

programme.title: Love and a Bullet
programme.desc: Singer Anthony "Treach" Criss of the band Naughty by Nature stars in this urban action-crime thriller as Malik "The Ghost" Bishop, a former street gang member turned top assassin. Assigned by his boss to stake out and kill the man's innocent girlfriend (Kent Masters King), Malik falls for his target, forcing him to reflect on his violent past, which began in his childhood when he witnessed the murder-suicide of his parents. He's led to make the fateful choice of turning on his superiors instead of carrying out the slaying, a decision that results in a brutal showdown. Love and a Bullet co-stars Bud Sabatino, Freez Luv, and Walter Jones. The film inspired an animated web series entitled "The Contract."(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: In Gary Winick's romantic comedy, Kate Hudson and Anne Hathaway star as best friends competing to nab the same location for their wedding reception. When Liv and Emma were girls they attended such an impressive wedding at New York's landmark Plaza Hotel that they swore that, when the time came, they would each celebrate their nuptials there. Twenty years later, after saying 'yes' to their respective fiancés, they've instructed their wedding planner to book the ceremony of their dreams. But because of a clerical error they're both given the same slot - and neither is willing to concede. Instead, their friendship is jettisoned as they resort to underhand tactics in a bid to sabotage each other and fulfil their marriage fantasies... Also starring Candice Bergen, Chris Pratt and Bryan Greenberg(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: A party-centric fraternity causes all sorts of havoc and hijinks on a college campus in the early 1960s, leading to their expulsion and a grand act of revenge(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: Satirical action drama set in the aftermath of the Gulf War. Four soldiers, finding a map indicating the location of secret bunkers inside the Iraqi border, go AWOL and head for the bunkers to get the gold looted from Kuwait which they believe to be hidden inside. However, they find a population being terrorised by Saddam Hussein's forces and desperate for help, and soon realise some things are more important than riches(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Rockstar Games' double-gunned action franchise comes to the big screen thanks to director John Moore (The Omen) and Mark Wahlberg, who embodies the title character of Max Payne, a widowed cop hell-bent on delivering justice no matter what the cost as he investigates a string of killings in his city. Mila Kunis and Chris O'Donnell head up the supporting cast, with Beau Thorne adapting the screenplay for the 20th Century Fox production(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit(n)

programme.title: The Cotton Club
programme.desc: A cornet player at a legendary 1920s-era Harlem nightspot gets caught in the orbit of a notorious gangster and his teenaged mistress(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD(n)

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: Naomi Watts shines in this thriller about a reporter who investigates her niece's mysterious death, which seems to be linked to a videotape. Apparently, anyone who watches the tape dies horribly seven days later. Martin Henderson, David Dorfman, Brian Cox, Jane Alexander, Lindsay Frost, Amber Tamblyn(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: William Peter Blatty's Oscar-winning adaptation of his bestseller about a child possessed by a demon(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: This intense and unnerving thriller should make viewers' skin crawl. Ashley Judd stars as an Oklahoma waitress who's battling her own addictive demons. She takes on a whole new set of problems when she gets involved with an unhinged Gulf War vet (Michael Shannon) who's wracked with paranoid delusions involving invasive insects and clandestine military experiments. Directed by William Friedkin and written by Tracy Letts, who adapted his stage play. Harry Connick Jr., Lynn Collins(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul (Ethan Hawke), headed to Mexico with his faithful collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang of misfits and finds himself exiled by the town marshal (John Travolta), which sparks a bloody quest for revenge. Karen Gillan and Taissa Farmiga co-star. Ti West wrote and directed this Western thriller(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: Based on a series of books by Patrick O'Brian, MASTER AND COMMANDER plunges viewers deep into the story of a British Navy ship at sea during the Napoleonic war. Russell Crowe stars as Aubrey, the charismatic captain who wrestles with issues like honour, pride, duty, sacrifice and loyalty while using ingenious tactics to engage his prey--a much larger and better-equipped French Man o' War. Paul Bettany plays his friend, the ship's doctor(n)

programme.title: Sudden Impact
programme.desc: Magnum 44 thriller. In his fourth screen outing as 'Dirty' Harry Callahan, Clint Eastwood tracks down a rape victim who is killing off the men responsible(n)

programme.desc: In Washington, D.C., in the year 2054, murder has been eliminated. The future is seen and the guilty punished before the crime has ever been committed. From a nexus deep within the Justice Department's elite Precrime Unit, all the evidence to convict - from imagery alluding to the time, place and other details - is seen by Pre-Cogs, three psychic beings whose visions of murder have never been wrong. It is the nation's most advanced crime force, a perfect system. And no-one works harder for Precrime than its top man, Chief John Anderton. Destroyed by a tragic loss, Anderton has thrown all of his passion into a system that could potentially spare thousands of people from the tragedy he lived through. Six years later, the coming vote to take it national has only fuelled his conviction that Precrime works. Anderton has no reason to doubt it... until he becomes its #1 suspect(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: The tumultuous life of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risked her life's savings to produce and market her invention of the Miracle Mop. The success of that invention sparked her television-shopping business empire(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: SNL alumni Tina Fey and Amy Poehler co-star in this Universal Studios comedy about two daffy adult sisters, one an irresponsible single mom and the other a kindhearted nurse, who decide to throw one last wild party at their childhood home before it's sold by their parents. However, their bash ends up going disastrously awry. Written by Paula Pell and directed by Jason Moore(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Three men relive their carefree college years by killing off as many brain cells as possible in this hilarious comedy. Mitch (Luke Wilson) returns home from a less-than-pleasant business trip one evening to discover his wife, Heidi (Juliette Lewis), involved in a ménage à trois with two blindfolded strangers. Feeling less than welcome at home after this, Mitch rents a house near the campus of a nearby college; two of Mitch's old college buddies, Beanie (Vince Vaughn) and Frank (Will Ferrell). Starring Will Ferrell, Vince Vaughn, Luke Wilson & Juliette Lewis(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: A macho cop goes undercover as a schoolteacher as part of his efforts to prosecute an elusive drug dealer, but quickly finds out he's no match for a roomful of feisty 6-year-olds(n)

programme.title: Love and a Bullet
programme.desc: Singer Anthony "Treach" Criss of the band Naughty by Nature stars in this urban action-crime thriller as Malik "The Ghost" Bishop, a former street gang member turned top assassin. Assigned by his boss to stake out and kill the man's innocent girlfriend (Kent Masters King), Malik falls for his target, forcing him to reflect on his violent past, which began in his childhood when he witnessed the murder-suicide of his parents. He's led to make the fateful choice of turning on his superiors instead of carrying out the slaying, a decision that results in a brutal showdown. Love and a Bullet co-stars Bud Sabatino, Freez Luv, and Walter Jones. The film inspired an animated web series entitled "The Contract."(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: In Gary Winick's romantic comedy, Kate Hudson and Anne Hathaway star as best friends competing to nab the same location for their wedding reception. When Liv and Emma were girls they attended such an impressive wedding at New York's landmark Plaza Hotel that they swore that, when the time came, they would each celebrate their nuptials there. Twenty years later, after saying 'yes' to their respective fiancés, they've instructed their wedding planner to book the ceremony of their dreams. But because of a clerical error they're both given the same slot - and neither is willing to concede. Instead, their friendship is jettisoned as they resort to underhand tactics in a bid to sabotage each other and fulfil their marriage fantasies... Also starring Candice Bergen, Chris Pratt and Bryan Greenberg(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: Satirical action drama set in the aftermath of the Gulf War. Four soldiers, finding a map indicating the location of secret bunkers inside the Iraqi border, go AWOL and head for the bunkers to get the gold looted from Kuwait which they believe to be hidden inside. However, they find a population being terrorised by Saddam Hussein's forces and desperate for help, and soon realise some things are more important than riches(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Crime Family. The Mob is demystified in the A&E program American Justice: Crime Family. Host Bill Kurtis takes the viewer into the heart of the New York underworld to examine the long arms of the Genovese family. Started when Vito Genovese worked under Lucky Luciano, the notorious family has a firm grip on syndicated crime. A&E presents rare footage of the gangster clan and its shady leaders. For years, police have pursued the Genovese, but they remain frustratingly immune to arrest. Hear from the prosecutors who have made their capture a full-time job and the historians who will explain why the Genovese will never die(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Crime of Passion: The Pamela Smart Story
programme.desc: Crime of Passion: The Pamela Smart Story. Youth, seduction, and violence populate the landscape of the A&E program American Justice: Crimes of Passion -- The Pamela Smart Story. As an attractive motivated schoolteacher, Pam Smart was carving out a successful middle-class life. But, inwardly, she was passionately dissatisfied. Her husband held her back, yet she couldn't afford to live alone. Then, Smart met teenager Bill Flynn. He fell for her and she seemed flattered by the attention. Eventually, their relationship became intimate and Smart found the answer to all her problems. Through manipulation and claims of abuse, she convinced her young lover to kill her husband and that's just what he did with the help of two friends. But, Smart's calculating manner gave her away when police suspected her of being less than grief-stricken. What followed was the first live broadcast trial in history. The media explosion surrounding the case was unparalleled. Smart turned out to be a lot less organized than she thought. When her killers caved and word got around of her arranged hit, she was doomed. A&E takes the viewer back to the original trial of the century(n)

programme.desc: Ted begins to have doubts over his ability to complete the Arcadian project - and Barney and Robin are horrified to realise he is considering getting back together with Zoey. Marshall secures an interview for his dream job, but is forced to fight off the effects of food poisoning. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor, with Chi McBride (Pushing Daisies) and Dave Foley (Kids in the Hall).(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess and Nick try to keep their break-up a secret, and Winston wants to celebrate after being accepted into the LAPD. Meanwhile, Schmidt helps Cece with her GED training. Sitcom, starring Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: When Jess is asked to organise a dance for the students at her school, she soon comes to suspect that somebody is trying to sabotage her efforts. Determined to make the event a success, she enlists the gang to help her chaperone on the big night. Sitcom, starring Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: A rumour about an incident involving a rock star boosts business for Max and Caroline's pop-up shop. However, Han becomes jealous of their success and tries to steal some of the attention for his diner. Meanwhile, Sophie and Oleg do their best to remain friends after their break-up. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings and Beth Behrs.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Caroline decides to use an online fundraising website when she needs money to buy an expensive pair of trousers. Meanwhile, problems arise when Max gets a new smartphone. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings and Beth Behrs.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is uninterested in Amy's career, so Penny, Raj and Leonard try to make him understand that sometimes it benefits a relationship to pretend to care about a partner's achievements. Howard notices Bernadette is uncomfortable around children when she helps him perform a magic show at his nephew's birthday party.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard asks Penny out on a date, and they agree to give their relationship another chance. They soon remember why it did not work out in the first place, but end up sleeping together anyway. The 100th episode of the comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Yasmine asks Esther for some part-time work, just as her sister Farrah turns up on the back of a motorbike. Elsewhere, Adam and Maxine get a welcome home shock, and Harry is alarmed when he visits Ste.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Riley is confined to the sofa under doctor's orders not to exert herself, while Ben is upset when Emma begins to ask questions about her mother. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: Star Trek: The Transporter Malfunction.
programme.desc: Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon some Star Trek action figures, but the duo refuse to remove them from the packaging in case their value is diminished. Elsewhere, Raj is desperate to find someone to accompany him to a wedding and asks his parents to find him a date. Featuring the guest voice of Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: Star Trek: The Spock Resonance.
programme.desc: While being interviewed for a documentary about Star Trek character Mr Spock, Sheldon struggles to suppress his emotions about his recent break-up with Amy, leaving Leonard and Penny shocked to discover he had bought her an engagement ring. Howard and Bernadette fall out over plans to renovate his childhood home. Wil Wheaton, Adam Nimoy and Stephen Merchant guest star.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The amateur critics share their opinions on The Jump, Dragons' Den, Death in Paradise, Jon Richardson: How to Survive the End of the World, SS-GB and the news. Craig Cash narrates.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: Documentary following the fortunes of humans and animals over the course of a year in Alaska, which is by far the biggest US state and still one of the wildest places on Earth with deep forests and vast mountain ranges. The arrival of spring sees Alaska go through a huge transformation as water, light and warmth return, with animals emerging from hibernation and rushing to cash in on the riches of the season. Dougray Scott narrates.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: The land is bathed in 24-hour sunlight during the short Alaskan summer, luring hummingbirds up from Mexico, exposing deserts in the Arctic and relying on parachuting firefighters to tackle forest fires in its vast wilderness. Grizzly bears fatten up on a sudden wealth of salmon, a caribou calf joins a vast herd on its great migration and a huge male moose finds unlikely ways to impress a female. Among the human population, a dedicated grower of giant vegetables takes his half-ton pumpkin to the Alaska State Fair.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: To survive the bone-chilling cold, deadly blizzards and darkness of the eight months of an Alaskan winter takes courage, cunning and remarkable endurance. This episode tells the stories of how the tough and resourceful animal and human inhabitants of the windswept mountain peaks, icy tundra and snowbound forests face up to the challenges of the season.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the connections between the wildlife, landscape and people of the Arabian peninsula. The first edition features animals including oryxes, jerboas, horned vipers and scorpions, and a journey with the Bedouin - camel-riding nomads who are the only humans to have mastered the art of survival in the desert. Narrated by Alexander Siddig.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Exploring the mountains of Dhofar in Oman, where the annual Indian Ocean monsoon has helped create a lost world of waterfalls and cloud forests filled with fascinating wildlife. The programme shows green sea turtles coming ashore in their thousands, shadowed by egg-stealing foxes, as well as footage of striped hyenas doing battle with Arabian wolves. Plus, a glimpse into the lives of chameleons, honey badgers and the elusive Arabian leopard.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: The changes that have swept across the Arabian peninsula since the discovery of oil. Camel racing has become a hi-tech sport and the region's animals now live alongside a very modern society, but technology is also being used to protect nature. The programme reveals how dugongs are fitted with satellite transmitters and hunting falcons chase down radio-controlled planes, and follows the construction of the world's first carbon-neutral city. Narrated by Alexander Siddig.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom

The arrival of spring sees Alaska go through a huge transformation as water, light and warmth return, with animals emerging from hibernation and rushing to cash in on the riches of the season. Dougray Scott narrates.(n)

programme.title: Alaska - Earth's Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: The land is bathed in 24-hour sunlight during the short Alaskan summer, luring hummingbirds up from Mexico, exposing deserts in the Arctic and relying on parachuting firefighters to tackle forest fires in its vast wilderness. Grizzly bears fatten up on a sudden wealth of salmon, a caribou calf joins a vast herd on its great migration and a huge male moose finds unlikely ways to impress a female. Among the human population, a dedicated grower of giant vegetables takes his half-ton pumpkin to the Alaska State Fair.(n)

programme.title: I Survived a Fatal Flight
programme.desc: Documentary in which three people who were the lone survivors of aircraft crashes discuss their ordeals, detailing the conflicting emotions they experienced after realising everyone else on board had died. D-Day veteran Phil Bradley was trapped in his seat for 36 hours after the plane he was travelling on crashed in Virginia in 1959, while Annette Herfkens drank rainwater to stay alive after a Vietnam Airlines jet crashed into a mountain in 1992. Juliane Koepcke, meanwhile, tells of being lost for 10 days in the Peruvian rainforest after a plane crash in 1971, and how her knowledge of jungle terrain helped to save her life.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: An insight into the lives of some of the world's cutest animals.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: The lives of white gyrfalcons and a pack of Arctic wolves on the frozen landscape of Ellesmere Island, Canada. The birds feed their young with the flesh of hares, while the lupine pack awaits the arrival of new cubs. Narrated by Simon Poland.(n)

programme.title: Monster Bug Wars
programme.desc: Fights to the death between creepy-crawlies, beginning with a whistling tarantula battling a bulldog raspy cricket and an ogre-faced spider facing an assassin bug.(n)

programme.title: Biggest & Baddest
programme.desc: Adventurer Niall McCann visits the bayous of Louisiana, where he hears stories about giant alligators that have eaten humans.(n)

programme.title: Wild Canada
programme.desc: A look at the scenery and wildlife of the North American nation, beginning with humpback whales feeding on capelin. Plus, an insight into a giant rainforest.(n)

programme.title: Wild Justice
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of 240 game wardens in California as they tackle everything from pollution to poachers. The first programme looks at the practice of growing marijuana illegally.(n)

programme.title: Bolt
programme.desc: Animated adventure. Bolt is the cute superhero dog star of a fictional TV show, who does not realise he is part of a TV show and believes his powers are real. When he mistakenly believes his human co-star is in danger, he embarks on a trek across America to save her life(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman returns as forensic psychologist Alex Cross (first seen in Kiss the Girls) who links up with Secret Service agent Vezzie Flannigan, responsible for the mistake that let brilliant but deadly psychopath kidnap a senator's daughter. As the clock ticks away, the pair realise that this crime is just the beginning in Lee Tamahori's nail-biting adaptation of James Patterson's outstanding thriller(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: The film focuses on the last few days of news anchor Dan Rather and producer Mary Mapes, after questions were raised about their controversial report on the special privilege and connections of President Bush in order to avoid fighting in the Vietnam War(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's terrifying masterpiece about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. But when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant Great White, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again. Based on Peter Benchley's best-seller, three sequels and numerous imitators followed. Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger runs across a gang of white renegades, called the Comancheros, who are trading guns and other contraband with marauding Comanches from a secret hideout in Mexico. He goes undercover as a partner with a vicious outlaw who is a contact man with the Comancheros and knows the whereabouts of their hideout in Mexico. Director Michael Curtiz's last film(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman returns as forensic psychologist Alex Cross (first seen in Kiss the Girls) who links up with Secret Service agent Vezzie Flannigan, responsible for the mistake that let brilliant but deadly psychopath kidnap a senator's daughter. As the clock ticks away, the pair realise that this crime is just the beginning in Lee Tamahori's nail-biting adaptation of James Patterson's outstanding thriller(n)

programme.title: Kiss of Death
programme.desc: Remake of the 1947 thriller about a former thief turned family man who finds his efforts to stay on the straight and narrow hampered by his underworld contacts. His cousin coerces him into helping out with one more job, but when it goes wrong the family face the wrath of a psychopathic mobster(n)

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage's Oscar winning performance in Mike Figgis' film sees Cage as a scriptwriter who's in love with the bottle. Taking his payoff, he heads to Las Vegas, where life (and booze) can be enjoyed 24 hours a day. Co-starring Elisabeth Shue as the hooker he falls for, this is by turn bleak and moving, as Cage's slow, awful self-knowing self-destruction becomes both his reason for living and his reason for dying(n)

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: A powerful, true story about members of the Navajo tribe who proudly served the U.S. in WWII as code talkers by using their native language as a code to relay information to military leaders. Unbeknownst to the Navajo is the dark secret that they're to be killed by American soldiers if one of them is in danger of being captured(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Ben Gates is off on another thrilling treasure hunt in this action-packed sequel involving a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, which leads to a globe-trotting race to find an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: A revolutionary medical technique allows an undercover agent to take the physical appearance of a major criminal and infiltrate his organisation(n)

programme.title: 8MM
programme.desc: Tom Welles (Nicolas Cage) is a surveillance expert on the rise. He's living the American dream with a wife, Amy (Catherine Keener), infant daughter, and a house in the suburbs of Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. After the completion of an assignment for a U.S. Senator, Welles is summoned to the house of a recently deceased captain of industry. His widow, in settling his estate, has discovered an 8MM film in her late husband's private safe. The silent short depicts the apparent murder of a young woman by a large, masked figure, what is known as a "snuff" film. Greatly disturbed by the film's contents, the widow hires Welles to find the identity of the woman and determine if she is still alive. Welles finds the girl's identity and follows her trail from the time she ran away from home to Hollywood. Once there, Welles meets adult bookstore clerk Max California (Joaquin Phoenix) to act as Virgil to Welles' Dante. As the two begin their descent into the world of underground pornography, the detective grows more and more distant from his family, as if he cannot shake the taint of the world in which he now walks. Tom and Max eventually meet pornographers Dino Velvet (Peter Stormare) and Eddie Poole (James Gandolfini). By this time the detective finds he can no longer walk out of the inferno(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: The film focuses on the last few days of news anchor Dan Rather and producer Mary Mapes, after questions were raised about their controversial report on the special privilege and connections of President Bush in order to avoid fighting in the Vietnam War(n)

programme.title: Saskatchewan
programme.desc: Adventure and romance entwine in this tale of a Canadian mountie who rescues a survivor of a Sioux uprising. Together, they must survive both the Saskatchewan terrain and the Sioux threat that surrounds them(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In a future, android-dependent world, a robot is implicated in a murder, despite this being seemingly impossible according to the laws of robotics(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Ben Gates is off on another thrilling treasure hunt in this action-packed sequel involving a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, which leads to a globe-trotting race to find an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: Widescreen Science-fiction adventure in which scientists discover a time portal which connects with a distant world. Left by the Egyptians, the Stargate is re-activated in the 20th-century and Colonel Jack O'Neil (Kurt Russell) and Egyptologist Dr Daniel Jackson (James Spader) are picked to head a crack team of explorers who venture through the gate to whatever lies beyond(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank Martin is back as the Transporter, who'll take anything anywhere, no questions asked, for the right money. This time, he's earning what should be easy money guarding the son of government drugs czar Billings. But when the boy is kidnapped by drugs lord Gianni, Martin takes it as a professional slur and sets out to find the boy and the baddies in Louis Leterrier's all-action film, co-written by Luc Besson(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Four years later, Brody now finds himself in a race against time when a new killer shark attacks ten boats manned by teenagers, which include his own sons(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: The film focuses on the last few days of news anchor Dan Rather and producer Mary Mapes, after questions were raised about their controversial report on the special privilege and connections of President Bush in order to avoid fighting in the Vietnam War(n)

programme.title: Bad Girls
programme.desc: Wild West hooker Cody is sentenced to hang for killing an abusive customer of her pal Anita. But three friends come to her aid, whisking her off the gallows and onto the road to Texas(n)

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: Widescreen Science-fiction adventure in which scientists discover a time portal which connects with a distant world. Left by the Egyptians, the Stargate is re-activated in the 20th-century and Colonel Jack O'Neil (Kurt Russell) and Egyptologist Dr Daniel Jackson (James Spader) are picked to head a crack team of explorers who venture through the gate to whatever lies beyond(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: A survivalist teams up with a military man to slay fire-breathing dragons in postapocalyptic 2020(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: An alienated young man joins a brutal club whose members relieve their frustrations by beating each other to a pulp(n)

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: A grad student encounters a hook-handed urban legend in Chicago's Cabrini Green housing projects(n)

programme.title: Godzilla: Final Wars
programme.desc: Giant monsters are rampaging in cities across the globe, and as the Earth Defense Force struggles to find a way to defeat the malicious mutants, their only hope lies frozen in the Antarctic in Versus director Ryuhei Kitamura futuristic entry into the long-running kaiju series. In the near future, Earth is being decimated by monsters that have been mysteriously unleashed in every major city from New York to Sydney, and as the world population falls into a paralyzing state of panic, the Earth Defense Force must stage a daring initiative to save the human race. After a giant unidentified flying object suddenly appears and vaporizes the beasts in a matter of seconds, the relieved citizens of Earth are comforted to hear that the newly arrived alien race is seeking to make a peace treaty with humankind. All is not as it seems, however, and as the nefarious aliens reveal their true nature, it's up to Godzilla to take back the planet -- or die trying(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: Gary Sinise stars in this mind-bending adaptation of a classic story by legendary sci-fi author Philip K. Dick. In 2079, a military scientist (Sinise) desperately tries to prove his true identity after he's accused of being a booby-trapped android from outer space. Vincent D'Onofrio, Madeleine Stowe, Tony Shalhoub(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the US president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack
programme.desc: After sandblasting away years of camp and bad scripts from the Gamera franchise to form a couple of tight-scripted, vastly entertaining flicks, Shusuke Kaneko gives the same treatment to the granddaddy of kaiju eiga characters: Godzilla. The film opens with Godzilla waking up from his underwater hideaway. Unseen since his 1954 attack on Tokyo, the monster is spotted by a Japanese submarine. Though government officials seem reluctant to confront the problem, Navy Admiral Tachibana (Ryudo Uzaki), who witnessed the rampage when he was a child, is more than a little alarmed. Meanwhile, Tachibana's daughter Yuri (Chiharu Niiyama), who works at a struggling TV station, is making a documentary in the mountains of Niigata Prefecture. One night, they experience a massive earthquake and that next morning they learn that a gang of motorcycle punks were crushed in a mountain tunnel and witnesses reportedly saw some sort of fire-breathing creature in the rubble. Later, a group of campers in southern Kagoshima prefecture are crushed by some Thing that crawled out of Lake Ikeda. Soon Japan is awash with monsters -- including Baradon, a monster that looks like a pug terrier with Mickey Mouse ears, and King Gidora, a three-headed beast with a lethal 50-meter tail -- busting up things north, south, east, and west(n)

programme.title: Godzilla: Final Wars
programme.desc: Giant monsters are rampaging in cities across the globe, and as the Earth Defense Force struggles to find a way to defeat the malicious mutants, their only hope lies frozen in the Antarctic in Versus director Ryuhei Kitamura futuristic entry into the long-running kaiju series. programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed director David Gordon Green takes a break from the brooding drama that defined such early efforts as George Washington and Undertow for this action-flavored buddy comedy concerning two pot-smoking friends (Seth Rogen and James Franco) who unwittingly become involved with a vicious gang of drug dealers. Judd Apatow and Shauna Robertson produce a script co-penned by star Rogen and Evan Goldberg(n)

programme.title: Howard the Duck
programme.desc: Director and co-screenwriter Willard Huyck has taken Steve Garber's abrasive, beer-drinking and cigar-smoking comic-book character and castrated him, turning him into a wide-eyed cutesy-pie available for the toy shelves. Huyck's Howard the Duck is a being from outer space, blown into Cleveland by an errant laser beam. After a few minutes on Earth, Howard runs into rock singer Beverly Switzler (Lea Thompson), and they become fast friends after Howard protects her from a couple of nasty punkers. The film then degenerates into an extended chase, as Howard and Beverly are pursued by government agents who want to capture Howard before he can be beamed back into space(n)

programme.title: Cat Run
programme.desc: This intense action comedy follows wannabe chef Anthony and unrepentant womanizer Julian as they team up to start a detective agency, and they get in over their heads while protecting a top-dollar escort with evidence of a conspiracy. Now, the mob, a crooked senator and an unusual assassin are all hot on their trail(n)

programme.title: John Ford Goes to War
programme.desc: This program salutes the legendary filmmaker who, during World War II, ran the Field Photographic Branch, a unit that shot a raft of documentaries that captured "the scope and sprawl of World War II." Kris Kristofferson is the narrator. Included are comments by Hollywood directors Oliver Stone and Peter Bogdanovich; and critics Leonard Maltin, Andrew Sarris and Richard Schickel(n)

programme.title: Bruce Lee, the Legend
programme.desc: The documentary is a tribute to Bruce Lee, who is a master of martial arts(n)

programme.title: Thick as Thieves
programme.desc: Before he retires, veteran thief Keith Ripley wants to pull off one last job so he can repay his debt to the Russian mob. He enlists the help of talented pilferer Gabriel Martin and the pair devise a strategy to steal two extremely valuable Fabergé eggs(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: The eighth day's play at Roland Garros, featuring fourth-round singles matches in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. Andy Murray continued his run to the final at this stage in 2016 with a 7-6. 6-4. 6-3 victory over John Isner, while 2015 champion Stan Wawrinka defeated Viktor Troicki 7-6, 6-7, 6-3, 6-3, and home favourite Richard Gasquet overcame fifth seed Kei Nishikori 6-4, 6-2, 4.6, 6-2. In the women's competition, eventual champion Garbine Muguruza prevailed 6-3, 6-4 against 2009 title-winner Svetlana Kuznetsova, and Shelby Rogers won by the same scoreline against Irina-Camelia Begu.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: Coverage of the ninth day's play at Roland Garros, where the fourth-round singles matches are scheduled to conclude in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year, as the quest to succeed last year's singles champions Novak Djokovic and Garbine Muguruza continues. This day in 2016 saw a full day's play cancelled for the first time in 16 years due to heavy rain. The organisers, players and fans will desperately be hoping for more friendly weather conditions this time around, as while a roof is being planned for Court Philippe Chatrier, it is not scheduled to be ready until 2020.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Ziva and Gibbs lead the mission to rescue the captured Marine in Afghanistan before discovering that her captor's brothers have bigger plans and are at large in America. Gibbs has to be stopped when he tries to employ methods similar to those used on Kinah and Lala in an effort to gain information, but Vance has a trick that gives the agents an idea of what the siblings have in mind.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony is forced to tackle a case with a personal element when his father is discovered drunk in a car that has a dead body in the boot. The victim is revealed to be Navy lieutenant Dean Massey, who DiNozzo Sr had threatened to kill after being cut out of a land development deal. Guest starring Robert Wagner.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Navy captain Jake Marsden is murdered in his hotel room and inquiries lead to marine lieutenant Emma Reynolds - who tells the team she was the intended target. After being stationed in Kabul, she became pregnant by a local man called Amir who was later killed in action - and Abby discovers he was the sole male heir of a wealthy family that owns a large tract of land in a politically sensitive part of Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy commander last seen in the company of a mysterious blonde woman, who turns out to be missing NCIS agent and Tony's ex-lover EJ Barrett. She identifies the murderer as Seal-turned-assassin Marcellus Dane, who is suspected of working for Casey Stratton - a member of black ops unit Phantom Eight. Guest starring Sarah Jane Morris.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An estate agent and two clients discover the body of Lt Com Maya Burris, a naval attache who had been working in Egypt, and her detective husband Nick arrives on the scene to demand answers. Using documents discovered on the victim's boat, Abby links her to Barry Norton, who is suspected of having sold government secrets to a Middle Eastern terrorist group known as the SRC.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and Lisbon investigate the death of a biker gang's lawyer, who they suspect was murdered because he knew too many of the members' secrets. However, another lead is uncovered when they meet a woman who held a grudge against him because he successfully defended her brother's alleged murderer in court. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: An architect is found dead at his mansion by a police officer who claims a ghost could have had some involvement in the murder. The team investigates conventional leads, while Jane concentrates on pursuing the supernatural angle, discovering there is rumoured to be treasure hidden in the building. Elsewhere, Rigsby confesses his true feelings to Grace. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Bosco arrests Jane after discovering the bug in his office, leaving Cho and the other agents to investigate a murder case. They believe the victim was killed in a dispute over oil-rich land, and when they hand evidence over to Patrick he comes up with leads from the confines of his cell - before setting into motion an elaborate escape plan. Guest starring Ashley Jones (True Blood), with Simon Baker and Terry Kinney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Bosco and Lisbon reluctantly team up to investigate the kidnapping of a woman from a wealthy family. They suspect her abductors could have been behind a previous case in which a man was murdered, prompting Jane to take an unorthodox approach to save the victim's life before the ransom is paid. Crime drama, starring Terry Kinney, Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team are shocked to discover serial killer Red John targeted the CBI headquarters while they were out on assignment, leaving two agents dead and seriously wounding Bosco. Jane soon uncovers a link to another case, which leads him to vital evidence in the investigation - and the discovery that the criminal had an accomplice in the office. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Three Men and a Comic Book
programme.desc: Three Men and a Comic Book. Comic books may come and go, but every red-blooded boy in Springfield loves "Radioactive Man," and Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright) is no exception. When Bart discovers the local comics shop, The Android's Dungeon, has a copy of the very rare first issue of "Radioactive Man," he's desperate to have it. Unfortunately, the comic is going for $100, and Bart only has $35 in his savings. Bart tries asking his parents for the money, looking under couch cushions, and (gasp!) even doing odd jobs for elderly Mrs. Glick (voice of Cloris Leachman), but he's still far short of the asking price, so Bart pools his finances with Milhouse (voice of Cartwright) and Martin (voice of Russi Taylor) and they buy the comic together. However, the three boys soon argue over who will get to keep the book, leading to an ugly scene in Bart's tree house. Daniel Stern also joins the voice cast in a brief parody of his narration of the TV series The Wonder Years. "Three Men and a Comic Book" first aired on May 9, 1991(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart's Friend Falls in Love. Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright) is used to spending much of his time with his best friend Milhouse (voice of Pamela Hayden), but that begins to change when a new girl moves to town, Samantha Stanky (voice of Kimmy Robertson). Samantha is in the same class as Bart and Milhouse, and it doesn't take long for Milhouse to develop a serious crush on her -- and for Samantha to make clear she's also fond of Milhouse. Bart, who still appears to be stuck in the "girls are yucky" stage, doesn't understand Milhouse's infatuation with Samantha, and when he discovers he's not only brought a girl to their tree house, but is kissing her as well, Bart decides its time to break up this romance before it can spread. Meanwhile, Marge (voice of Julie Kavner) orders a subliminal weight-loss tape in hopes of getting her hubby, Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta), to drop a few pounds. But Homer receives a "Increase Your Vocabulary" instead, and while he continues to gain weight, when he speaks, he suddenly sounds like a walking thesaurus. "Bart's Friend Falls in Love" first aired on May 7, 1992(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Streetcar Named Marge. Looking for something to break the monotony of her life as a housewife, Marge Simpson (voice of Julie Kavner) auditions for the Springfield Community Center's upcoming production of Streetcar! -- a musical adaptation of A Streetcar Named Desire. The director, melodramatic Llewllyn Sinclair (voice of Jon Lovitz), isn't impressed at first by Marge's audition, but after hearing her talk to Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta), he's convinced she's just the woman to play Blanche DuBois opposite Ned Flanders (voice of Harry Shearer), who was cast because he looks better with his shirt off than anyone else who tried out. Homer doesn't think much of Marge's new interest in theater, and her anger at her husband gives her performance a keen emotional edge, but will this rift in their marriage prove irreparable? Meanwhile, since Marge is busy with rehearsals, she sends baby Maggie to a daycare center, the Ayn Rand School for Tots, where the staff is determined to keep the children away from their pacifiers; Maggie, however, isn't about to give it up without a fight. A Streetcar Named Marge first aired on October 1, 1992(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer's Barbershop Quartet. Homer recalls when he, Apu, Barney and Principal Skinner became recording icons---after Barney replaced Chief Wiggum, on the advice of their manager(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa's Rival. Lisa has a new classmate who is even more intelligent than she is - will Lisa's jealousy get the better of her? Featuring the guest voice of Winona Ryder(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Radioactive Man. Hollywood moguls and comic book fans everywhere are abuzz over the news that Radioactive Man is to be adapted into a major motion picture, and observers are surprised by two bits of news concerning the project -- Teutonic action star Rainier Wolfcastle (voice of Harry Shearer) has been cast in the title role, and the producers have chosen to shoot the entire film on location in Springfield. Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright), an ardent Radioactive Man fan, hears there will be an open call to find a young actor to play youthful sidekick "Fallout Boy," and considers himself a cinch to win the role. However, the part instead goes to Bart's close friend Milhouse (voice of Pamela Hayden), who isn't even certain he wants it. Milhouse's dissatisfaction with his new stardom grows, and one day he disappears; Bart sets out to find him and convince him not to pass up the chance of a lifetime. Meanwhile, Mayor Quimby (voice of Dan Castellaneta) busies himself by creating a wide variety of new taxes to levy against the film's production team. "Radioactive Man" also features a cameo by Mickey Rooney, who plays himself trying to convince Milhouse to finish the film; the episode first aired on September 24, 1995(n)

Comedy based on Megan McDonald's series of children's books, starring Jordana Beatty and Heather Graham.(n)

When a curse placed on the town by a witch centuries ago causes zombies to rise from the grave, it falls to the youngster to avert disaster. Animated adventure, with the voices of Kodi Smit-McPhee and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Mirror Mirror
programme.desc: A princess is banished to a dark forest after the death of her father, leaving her wicked stepmother to rule over the kingdom. The exiled aristocrat joins forces with a band of rebellious dwarfs to reclaim her father's throne and stop the evil queen seducing the prince she is in love with. Fantasy, starring Julia Roberts, Lily Collins and Armie Hammer.(n)

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A single man gets the chance to turn his unhappy life around when his father reveals that they both have the ability to travel through time and change their personal history. He uses his newfound talent to try to improve his love life and win the heart of an American woman he has fallen for. Romantic fantasy comedy, with Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: A retired CIA agent survives an assassination attempt and realises something in his past has made him a target. He sets out to reunite the members of his old hit squad to find out who is trying to kill them and why, but in the process, uncovers dangerous secrets. Action thriller, with Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich and Helen Mirren.(n)

He needs someone with inside knowledge of the criminals, and is reluctantly forced to temporarily release a fast-talking thief from prison to help him in his investigation. Comedy thriller, starring Nick Nolte, Eddie Murphy and Annette O'Toole.(n)

programme.title: Rust and Bone
programme.desc: A single father raising a five-year-old son he barely knows gets a job as a nightclub bouncer, where he becomes fascinated with an aloof killer whale trainer at a marine park. When she loses her legs in a tragic accident, she turns to him for support and a powerful bond develops between them. Romantic drama, starring Marion Cotillard and Matthias Schoenaerts. In French and English.(n)

programme.desc: Construction workers battle against Japanese forces while working with the US navy in the South Pacific during the Second World War, while the head of the company and an officer compete for the affections of a local woman. However, when one recklessly causes a tragedy, he seeks redemption by launching an attack on a tank battalion. Drama, starring John Wayne, Susan Hayward and Dennis O'Keefe.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Dolittle

Undaunted, he manages to escape from the asylum and embarks on a quest to locate a rare aquatic snail. Oscar-winning musical comedy, with Rex Harrison, Samantha Eggar, Richard Attenborough and Anthony Newley. Songs include Talk to the Animals and I've Never Seen Anything Like It.(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control

programme.title: Escape Plan

He hatches a plan to escape, but to succeed he will need the help of a long-term convict - who wants his own freedom in return for assistance. Thriller, with Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger.(n)

A British soldier deployed to Belfast in 1971, almost immediately finds himself caught up in a riot. In the aftermath, he becomes separated from the rest of his unit. Lost and alone at night in a hostile and unfamiliar area, he makes a disturbing journey in search of safety. Thriller, starring Jack O'Connell and Richard Dormer.(n)
