programme.desc: This ensemble family comedy follows the Cooper family as four generations gather for their annual Christmas Eve celebration. A series of unexpected events disrupts the evening, but the family comes together and regains the spirit of the season. Directed by Jessie Nelson. Cast includes: Alan Arkin, John Goodman, Ed Helms, Diane Keaton and Olivia Wilde(n)

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live From Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Public Enemy perform at Metropolis Studios in London(n)

programme.title: Jimi: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: This biopic covers a year in the life of rock star Jimi Hendrix, as he crafted his debut album in England and ignited the 1967 Monterey Pop Festival with a performance that would go down as one of the most-memorable in rock-and-roll history(n)

programme.title: Bob Dylan: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Bob Dylan flies to London to visit his friend Dave Stewart, but he gets lost(n)

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: The first teen to come out of the closet at North Gateway High struggles to balance his newfound popularity with his longtime friendships as the three most popular girls in school all attempt to claim him as their G.B.F. (gay best friend). The moment Tanner (Michael J. Willett) reveals his true sexuality to his classmates he rockets up the social ladder. Suddenly, he's decked out in the latest fashions, and living it up with the in-crowd. Meanwhile, the friends who used to be part of Tanner's inner circle get left out in the cold. Now Tanner will be faced with the most difficult decision of his high school career -- keep riding the popularity train and accept his role as a human fashion accessory, or go back to the people who have always accepted him for who he really is. Megan Mullally, Jonathan Silverman, Rebecca Gayheart, and Natasha Lyonne co-star in a comedy from director Darren Stein(n)

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: Acclaimed music-video director Jesse Peretz made his third feature with this comedy starring Zach Braff and Jason Bateman. Tom (Braff) is an aspiring chef whose wife Sofia (Amanda Peet) has just quit her high-paying job to stay home with their new baby. When it becomes abundantly clear that they can no longer maintain their New York City lifestyle, the family picks up and moves to Sofia's hometown in Ohio, where Tom is hired to work at her father's ad agency. It is there that Tom meets Chip (Bateman), the agency's wheelchair-bound golden boy, who also happened to have a one-night stand with Sofia while the two were cheerleaders in high school. Suddenly, Tom finds himself sabotaged by Chip at every step as the nefarious paraplegic schemes to steal Sofia from him and destroy any chance he might have of success at the agency. Released briefly in 2006 under the title Fast Track, the film was retitled The Ex before receiving a wide release in the Spring of 2007(n)

programme.desc: In this taut political thriller, a British screenwriter (Ewan McGregor) agrees to ghostwrite the memoirs of a retired prime minister, but after he takes the job the former political leader is accused of committing a war crime. As the writer uncovers facts that corroborate these suspicions, he begins to fear he might be killed, just like the man who worked on the memoirs before him. Directed by Roman Polanski. Pierce Brosnan, Tom Wilkinson, Olivia Williams(n)

programme.desc: As high-school student Miley Stewart's alter ego, pop star Hannah Montana, continues to grow in popularity, Miley struggles to keep up with her schoolwork and friendships. Worried that fame will take over her life, Miley's father takes her to Crowley Corners, Tenn., in hopes of bringing her back down to earth(n)

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: An examination of the 2003 murder of Baylor University basketball player Patrick Dennehy by his friend Carlton Dotson, and the ensuing accusations aimed at the university and coach Dave Bliss(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s(n)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Adaptation of Dumas's classic tale of injustice and intrigue in the Napoleonic era. Sailor Edmond Dantes is unjustly accused of being a political traitor, betrayed by his best friend over a girl and imprisoned for 13 years in the infamous Chateau d'If. When he finally makes good his escape, Dantes plans to exact sweet revenge on his persecutors(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: In this relentless psychological thriller, blue-collar worker Adam Cassidy becomes a corporate spy for a ruthless CEO who wants him to infiltrate the competition. In time, Adam realizes that he's being used as a pawn in a much-larger game(n)

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Director Kathryn Bigelow's Iraq War-set action thriller presents the conflict in the Middle East from the perspective of those who witnessed the fighting firsthand -- the soldiers. As an elite Army Explosive Ordnance Disposal team tactfully navigates the streets of present-day Iraq, they face the constant threat of death from incoming bombs and sharp-shooting snipers. In Baghdad, roadside bombs are a common danger. The Army is working to make the city a safer place for Americans and Iraqis, so when it comes to dismantling IEDs (improvised explosive devices) the Explosive Ordnance Disposal (EOD) crew is always on their game. But protecting the public isn't easy when there's no room for error, and every second spent dismantling a bomb is another second spent flirting with death. Now, as three fearless bomb technicians take on the most dangerous job in Baghdad, it's only a matter of time before one of them gets sent to "the hurt locker." Starring Jeremy Renner, Guy Pearce, and Ralph Fiennes(n)

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Garry Marshall's drama stars Bette Midler as CC Bloom, a pop star rehearsing for her big Hollywood show. Suddenly, a phone call sees her drop everything and travel post haste to San Francisco and the bedside of her friend Hillary Whitney. And through flashback, her journey is used to tell the story of the undying friendship she and her friend Hillary forged as 12 year olds and maintained through teenage years and into adulthood, through the ups-and-downs of their careers - and even both falling for the same guy John Pierce. And as CC makes it to Hillary's side, she must make a choice that will shape her life and career forever(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Jason is an American teenager obsessed with Hong Kong cinema and kung-fu classics. One day, he makes an extraordinary discovery in a Chinatown pawnshop -- he finds the legendary fighting stick of Chinese sage and warrior The Monkey King. With the stick in his hands, he is suddenly transported back to ancient China, where he joins an army of fierce warriors. Together, they'll embark in a dangerous quest to free the imprisoned king. Martial arts stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li come together onscreen for the first time ever(n)

programme.title: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: An old legend haunts the town of Darkness Falls: the tale of the Tooth Fairy, the spirit of an old woman who hangs over the town after she was unjustly murdered by a vengeful mob. The story goes that she can't step into light, but if you wake up at night and see her, she will kill you. Twelve years after Kyle escaped the Tooth Fairy's clutches, he must return to Darkness Falls to face his fears(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: (2007) Ethan and Joel Coen's Oscar-laden thriller stars Josh Brolin as Llewelyn Moss, a trailer-dwelling welder and hunter. Hunting deer in the desert, he comes across a drugs exchange which has gone bloodily wrong, and among the detritus is a case containing $2m. He decides to appropriate the money, but it's not a wise move: he soon has the deadly assassin Anton Chigurh (Javier Bardem) on his trail, as well as Sheriff Ed Tom Bell (Tommy Lee Jones), and smiling bounty hunter Carson Wells (Woody Harrelson). As Moss tries to keep hold of the cash, and preserve both his own life and that of his wife Carla (Kelly Macdonald), a deadly game of cat-and-mouse is played out across the Tex-Mex border, as pursuers and the pursued try to gain the upper hand. In English, and Spanish with English subtitles. M,W,S(n)

programme.title: Saw V
programme.desc: The fifth instalment of the horror franchise reveals how original serial-killer Jigsaw trained Detective Hoffman (Costas Mandylor) to follow in his bloody footsteps as the latest five trapped victims ponder how to survive the deadly puzzles set for them(n)

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Four teens living in inner-city Cleveland (Jorge Lendeborg Jr., Moisés Arias, Rafi Gavron, and Ezri Walker) steal cars to support their dream of becoming pro skateboarders, and discover a large stash of pills during one heist. When they decide to sell the drugs themselves, they are targeted by an organic-food proprietor who's secretly a local crime boss (Linda Emond). Michael Kenneth Williams and Erykah Badu co-star. Steven Caple Jr. wrote and directed this crime drama, which made its world premiere at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A decorated Vietnam veteran becomes a local hero after standing up to a pair of skinheads on a transit bus, and he later takes the law into his own hands after the police fail to investigate the brutal murder of his best friend. When Frank Vega (Danny Trejo) returned home from fighting for his country, he should have been hailed as a hero. Instead, he drifted into the margins of society after failing to find a job and being abandoned by his high-school sweetheart. Decades later, when Frank sees a pair of skinheads harassing an elderly black man on a city bus, he knocks them both out as the incident is captured on video. An instant viral hit, the widely circulated video turns Frank into an Internet celebrity. But his fame comes at a high price when his best friend Klondike is killed and authorities sweep the murder under the rug. Meanwhile, Frank's biggest battle is yet to come. Ron Perlman and Charles S. Dutton co-star(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
programme.desc: Bullets fly and bodies drop in this sequel that finds Vietnam Veteran Frank Vega (Danny Trejo) training young boxers at an East L.A. community center. Despite doing his best to maintain a peaceful existence in a city overrun by crime, Frank is pulled back into the fray after his top student is murdered. Convinced that the killer still lurks in the city's criminal underbelly, Frank recruits his best friend Bernie (Danny Glover) that they're not too old to mete out a little vigilante justice. Unfortunately their quest for vengeance soon leads them to a powerful criminal who uses his diplomatic immunity to evade justice. Unfortunately for him, diplomatic immunity doesn't quite carry the same protection as a bullet proof vest, and before long Frank and Bernie have their slippery target running scared(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A recently paroled prison gang member is shot dead, and suspicion falls on former crime associates - until his battle behind bars with a corrections officer comes to light. McCoy then learns the defence attorney will claim his client took action to ward off a threat by the con and his `brotherhood'. Guest starring Candice Bergen.(n)

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A gifted youngster is packed off by her selfish parents to the prison-like Crunchem Hall School. Once there, she befriends a sweet-natured teacher who convinces her that not all grown-ups are bad - and urges her to use her special powers to turn the tables on the nasty headmistress. Fantasy comedy, adapted from the children's book by Roald Dahl, with Mara Wilson, Pam Ferris, Embeth Davidtz, Rhea Perlman and Danny DeVito, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: The team visits an abandoned asylum with a terrible history.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An Iraqi immigrant kills a female veteran of the second Gulf War for torturing her brother at Abu Ghraib prison. However, the detectives learn the accused's lawyer plans to defend his client as an enemy combatant, immune from prosecution under the terms of the Geneva Convention, and that they may have no jurisdiction over the case. Starring Jesse L Martin and Dennis Farina.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman is accused of murdering her husband's mistress. Although the crime is found to be premeditated, the defendant's lawyer claims his client's actions were prompted by post-traumatic stress syndrome arising from the September 11 terrorist attack. Starring Dennis Farina.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A recently paroled prison gang member is shot dead, and suspicion falls on former crime associates - until his battle behind bars with a corrections officer comes to light. programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The tricksters discover a valuable Picasso has been stolen, so they try to sell a forgery of the painting back to the original owner - only to come unstuck when Mickey is kidnapped. To rescue their leader, the grifters have to find out who took the original and then steal it back, but with so many fakes and double-crossers lurking behind every corner, they have a challenge on their hands to save Mickey in time. Sheila Hancock, Bill Bailey and Martin Kemp guest star.(n)

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: Harry's suspicions about the death of CIA boss Samuel Walker are confirmed when three more intelligence officers are killed - fatalities that coincide with the re-emergence of Ros's former MI6 mentor, who asks her to read his memoirs. Finding inconsistencies in the retired agent's recollections, she begins to suspect a terrible plot has been put into action and risks her life to discover the truth. Guest starring former Doctors actor Stephen Boxer.(n)

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: An MI5 informant in a major bank, who could allow an almost bankrupt British government access to £1billion of illegal earnings, refuses to share vital data with Section D. Ros is dispatched to bring him in, but assassins are also on his trail - and she gets caught in the crossfire as they try to silence him. Espionage drama, guest starring Ewen Bremner, with Hermione Norris.(n)

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Martin McDonagh's Oscar-nominated, BAFTA-winning Film4 debut film stars Colin Farrell and Brendan Gleeson as Ray and Ken, two professional Irish hitmen. After a botched job, they're sent by their boss Harry Waters to hide out in Bruges. Ken loves the city and its history; Ray hates it, until he hooks up with beautiful drugs dealer Chloe and a mouthy dwarf actor, Jimmy. Unfortunately, just as life seems to be improving for the two hitmen, psychopathic Harry phones to deliver stark instructions: the nature of the botched hit has offended his sense of morality and he's decided to break up the partnership, ordering one of the duo to kill the other. This tests the bond linking the three men, and leads to a violent denouement in the ancient city's cobbled streets(n)

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: Four expert hit men blast their way into a slave trader's stronghold, gaining the favor of a powerful mob boss. But when they kidnap a young heiress who happens to be the boss's goddaughter, they soon become targets themselves. A hard-hitting action-thriller executive produced by John Woo. Mark Wahlberg, Lou Diamond Phillips, Christina Applegate, Antonio Sabato Jr., Lela Rochon(n)

programme.title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
programme.desc: A prim, middle-aged British governess finds herself caught in a love triangle when she goes to work for a dizzy American actress in 1939 London. Frances McDormand and Amy Adams star in this breezy and delightful romantic comedy. Directed by Bharat Nalluri(n)

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: An injured soldier returns home to spend Christmas with his family after serving overseas, also hoping to track down his lost love. He finds his siblings have problems of their own to cope with, while his mother is planning to divorce his secretive father(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: In 'Brooklyn's Finest', we're taken on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie (Richard Gere) is a bitter and disillusioned veteran cop who's a week away from retirement. Tango (Don Cheadle) is an undercover narcotics cop who tries desperately to leave the streets and earn a promotion to a desk job. Much like Eddie, he's lost sight of his priorities and his loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. At the same time, narcotics detective Sal is a family man in despair and needs to raise money to buy a better house for his family. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene(n)

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: A withdrawn young man in a small rural town grows bored with his life, which consists of a meaningless job and the tiresome task of caring for his mentally handicapped brother. The arrival of a new girl in town, however, brings unexpected changes for everyone in this quirky drama(n)

After a botched job, they're sent by their boss Harry Waters to hide out in Bruges. Ken loves the city and its history; Ray hates it, until he hooks up with beautiful drugs dealer Chloe and a mouthy dwarf actor, Jimmy. Unfortunately, just as life seems to be improving for the two hitmen, psychopathic Harry phones to deliver stark instructions: the nature of the botched hit has offended his sense of morality and he's decided to break up the partnership, ordering one of the duo to kill the other. This tests the bond linking the three men, and leads to a violent denouement in the ancient city's cobbled streets(n)

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: Four expert hit men blast their way into a slave trader's stronghold, gaining the favor of a powerful mob boss. But when they kidnap a young heiress who happens to be the boss's goddaughter, they soon become targets themselves. A hard-hitting action-thriller executive produced by John Woo. Mark Wahlberg, Lou Diamond Phillips, Christina Applegate, Antonio Sabato Jr., Lela Rochon(n)

programme.title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
programme.desc: A prim, middle-aged British governess finds herself caught in a love triangle when she goes to work for a dizzy American actress in 1939 London. Frances McDormand and Amy Adams star in this breezy and delightful romantic comedy. Directed by Bharat Nalluri(n)

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: An injured soldier returns home to spend Christmas with his family after serving overseas, also hoping to track down his lost love. He finds his siblings have problems of their own to cope with, while his mother is planning to divorce his secretive father(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: In 'Brooklyn's Finest', we're taken on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie (Richard Gere) is a bitter and disillusioned veteran cop who's a week away from retirement. Tango (Don Cheadle) is an undercover narcotics cop who tries desperately to leave the streets and earn a promotion to a desk job. Much like Eddie, he's lost sight of his priorities and his loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. At the same time, narcotics detective Sal is a family man in despair and needs to raise money to buy a better house for his family. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene(n)

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: A withdrawn young man in a small rural town grows bored with his life, which consists of a meaningless job and the tiresome task of caring for his mentally handicapped brother. The arrival of a new girl in town, however, brings unexpected changes for everyone in this quirky drama(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Murder of Gods. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: Old Curses. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Biopic following George W Bush's unlikely journey from reckless beer-swilling frat boy to President of the United States. Drama comedy(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Search. Claire and Jenny head off to save Jamie from the redcoat captors and meet up with Murtagh, who joins them. The trio employ unusual tactics to get word to Jamie(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Murder of Gods. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: Old Curses. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: Old Curses. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Bucky Larson: Born to Be a Star
programme.desc: Adam Sandler co-writes and produces this Columbia Pictures comedy starring Nick Swardson as Bucky Larson, a nerd from nowhere who heads out West to become a porn star after finding out his parents were ones themselves. Upon arriving in Hollywood, a waitress (Christina Ricci) with self-esteem issues gets him situated in the slightly less seedy part of town. Meanwhile, Bucky connects with a friend of his parents, Miles Deep (Don Johnson), who pities the backwards man-child and gives him a shot in the world of porn - only to discover that he's severely lacking in both experience and manliness. Through sheer luck, the footage of Bucky becomes a viral hit on the internet and he is propelled to the top of the adult film business, irking the current king of porn actors, Dick Shadow (Stephen Dorff), who'll do anything to not be in the shadow of the small time fool. The Hot Chick's Tom Brady handled directing duties(n)

programme.title: When the Bough Breaks
programme.desc: A young woman agrees to be the surrogate for a married couple, but she soon becomes infatuated with the household's father-to-be in this blend of horror and erotic drama. Although she initially seems stable and normal during an introduction with would-be parents John (Morris Chestnut) and Laura (Regina Hall), Anna (Jaz Sinclair) grows fixated on John and is willing to do whatever it takes to seduce him. Directed by Jon Cassar(n)

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: Romantic drama about a teenage girl who falls for a handsome, wealthy man from afar - only to find herself capturing his eye when she blossoms into a beautiful young woman(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Scientists scramble to stop a giant comet that is threatening to destroy Earth in this drama(n)

programme.title: Careful What You Wish For
programme.desc: After taking a job at a vacation community, a teen (Nick Jonas) has an affair with the wife of an abusive investment banker (Isabel Lucas). However, their tryst leads to both of them being entangled in a murder. Dermot Mulroney co-stars. Directed by Elizabeth Allen(n)

programme.title: When the Bough Breaks
programme.desc: A young woman agrees to be the surrogate for a married couple, but she soon becomes infatuated with the household's father-to-be in this blend of horror and erotic drama. Although she initially seems stable and normal during an introduction with would-be parents John (Morris Chestnut) and Laura (Regina Hall), Anna (Jaz Sinclair) grows fixated on John and is willing to do whatever it takes to seduce him. Directed by Jon Cassar(n)

programme.title: My Blind Brother
programme.desc: A slacker named Bill (Nick Kroll) lives in the shadow of his vastly more successful brother Robbie (Adam Scott), an athlete whose achievements are made even more impressive due to the fact that he's blind. When the pair both fall for the same woman (Jenny Slate), Bill is forced compete against his arrogant, narcissistic sibling for the first time. Zoe Kazan co-stars. Written and directed by Sophie Goodhart(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Scientists scramble to stop a giant comet that is threatening to destroy Earth in this drama(n)

programme.title: We Own the Night
programme.desc: By-the-book cops-and-robbers thriller about a shady Brooklyn nightclub owner (Joaquin Phoenix) who clashes with his police-chief father (Robert Duvall) and cop brother (Mark Wahlberg) in 1988. Eva Mendes, Antoni Corone, Moni Moshonov. Written and directed by James Gray(n)

programme.title: When the Bough Breaks
programme.desc: A young woman agrees to be the surrogate for a married couple, but she soon becomes infatuated with the household's father-to-be in this blend of horror and erotic drama. Although she initially seems stable and normal during an introduction with would-be parents John (Morris Chestnut) and Laura (Regina Hall), Anna (Jaz Sinclair) grows fixated on John and is willing to do whatever it takes to seduce him. Directed by Jon Cassar(n)

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: Thriller about two New York detectives. When a child rapist and killer escapes justice, detective Turk disregards the rule book and frames him for a murder he did not commit. Almost immediately, somebody begins murdering the city's criminals one by one, and Turk and his partner Rooster are the investigators(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Two entrepreneurs start an airline that caters to a black clientele(n)

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: After awakening from hyper-sleep with no memory of their mission, astronauts Lt. Payton and Cpl. Bower discover that the 60,000 passengers aboard their vast spacecraft have vanished without a trace(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Murder of Gods. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: We Own the Night
programme.desc: By-the-book cops-and-robbers thriller about a shady Brooklyn nightclub owner (Joaquin Phoenix) who clashes with his police-chief father (Robert Duvall) and cop brother (Mark Wahlberg) in 1988. Eva Mendes, Antoni Corone, Moni Moshonov. Written and directed by James Gray(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: A disillusioned Israeli counter-terrorist soldier fakes his own death in order to fulfil his dream of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)
Fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: Waterlogged sequel with the disaster-prone Annie Porter, this time battling a madman on a cruise ship with the help of her new boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: (2002) Martin Scorsese's multi-Oscar-nominated epic stars Daniel Day-Lewis as William Cutting, the leader of a violent gang in 19th-century New York who take on their rivals, led by "Priest" Vallon (Liam Neeson). Vallon dies and his young son Amsterdam disappears, only to return a man (Leonardo DiCaprio) torn between a thirst for revenge and a fascination for the charismatic Cutting, with Cameron Diaz as Jenny Everdeane, the pickpocket they both love(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: A disillusioned Israeli counter-terrorist soldier fakes his own death in order to fulfil his dream of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: Two New Jersey shop workers spend a day discussing sex, girls, porn and movie trivia, attending a wake and playing rooftop hockey(n)

programme.title: Mallrats
programme.desc: Bawdy U.S. comedy film about two comic-obsessed students who are dumped by their respective girlfriends and try to come to terms with their romantic loss at the local shopping mall(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: Ben Affleck and Jason Lee are starting to make it as a comic strip creators but their friendship is threatened when Affleck falls head-over-heels for Joey Lauren Adams, who is gay. Kevin Smith, whose Clerks showed earlier, offers an engaging, amusing love story that carries an underlying seriousness about the pains of love(n)

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy in which a pair of eccentric New Jersey slackers head to Hollywood after discovering that a film is being made featuring superheroes based on their likenesses. As they head west, a series of misadventures befalls them, including close encounters with a group of glamorous jewel thieves and an orangutan(n)

programme.title: Clerks II
programme.desc: You can take the clerks out of the Quick Stop, but you just can't take the Quick Stop out of the clerks as Dante (Brian O'Halloran) and Randall (Jeff Anderson) prove in this long-awaited sequel to Kevin Smith's breakthrough comedy. Years after we last saw them, Dante is still toiling behind the counter at a New Jersey convenience store and Randall is still annoying customers at the video shop next door -- or at least they are until a fire burns down the strip mall, forcing Dante and Randall to look for work. Times are tough, and the guys find themselves embracing the ultimate indignity as they take jobs at Mooby's, a fast-food outlet where the burgers are advertised as "udderly delicious." While Randall's snarky attitude toward the public remains unchanged, Dante is trying to make the best of the situation as he plans to marry his fiancée, Emma (Jennifer Schwalbach Smith), and move to Florida. However, Dante's plans are complicated when he falls for Becky (Rosario Dawson), a funny and tart-tongued woman who happens to be his boss at Mooby's. Lurking about in the background, as always, are Jay (Jason Mewes) and Silent Bob (Kevin Smith), who for good or ill have changed even less with the passage of time than Dante and Randall. Clerks II also features Wanda Sykes, Ethan Suplee, and Trevor Fehrman, with cameo appearances from Kevin Smith regulars Ben Affleck and Jason Lee(n)

programme.title: Edge of Winter
programme.desc: In this gripping thriller, a divorced man tries to bond with his two sons during a hunting trip in the wilderness. However, the brothers realize that they might not be able to trust their father when a snowstorm strands all of them in a deserted cabin(n)

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Kristin Stewart and Dakota Fanning star in Floria Sigismondi's rock biopic, based on Cherie Currie's autobiography. It's the mid-1970s and southern Californian teen Joan Larkin has changed her name to Joan Jett. Along with her new dark, edgy identity comes a nascent desire: to create an all-girl rock band. Joan and her aggressive manager Kim Fowley stumble across the perfect face for the band: 15-year-old blonde bombshell Cherie Currie. The two girls become close, with Cherie's sweet melodies slickly harmonising with Joan's electrifying guitar solos to great effect. They name themselves The Runaways and, after recruiting a lead guitarist and a bass player, are soon signed to Mercury Records, and plunged into the deep end of 70s rock excess. The success of their first album is massive. But, after a concert in Japan, the rest of the band discover magazines that feature only pictures of Cherie inside them - and are furious that they've been left out. Cherie begins to crumble under the pressures of being the face of the band, and finds solace in alcohol and drugs. As the band's stability disintegrates, can the girls rediscover the runaway rock and roll lifestyle they sought? Also starring Stella Maeve, Scout Taylor-Compton and Alia Shawkat(n)

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst is the French princess who just wants to have fun. Mix Oscar-winning costumes and tracks by The Strokes and Aphex Twin for a champagne cocktail with pop(n)

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: Elegant account of an English butler's professional and emotional life, examined retrospectively during a journey toward a reunion with the housekeeper he loved years before. He recalls his lengthy unquestioned service with a reactionary, pro-Nazi aristocrat, and his painfully unfulfilled relationship with the woman he is going to meet. Meticulous Merchant Ivory production based on Kazuo Ishiguro's novel(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: In this fascinating drama set in 1932 and based on actual events, Irish political activist Jimmy Gralton reopens a community hall in his hometown with the help of the locals. However, he faces opposition from both the government and a crotchety priest, who suspect the hall is a hotbed for loose morals and communist activity(n)

programme.title: Henry Poole Is Here
programme.desc: Henry Poole moves in to a house in his old neighbourhood, to spend what he believes are his remaining days alone. The discovery of a miracle by a nosy neighbour ruptures his solitude and restores his faith in life(n)

programme.title: Basquiat
programme.desc: Basquiat tells the story of the meteoric rise of youthful artist Jean-Michel Basquiat who starting out his career as a street artist(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars in Sofia Coppola's Oscar-winning film as over-the-hill actor Bob Harris, who is lured to Tokyo to "act" in a whisky commercial in return for big money. In the hotel bar, he bumps into Charlotte, the wife of a successful photographer on assignment who has been left to her own devices. Two strangers in an "alien" city, they form a friendship which slips into tenderness as they recognise each other's vulnerability. By turn comic and touching, the duo turn in pitch-perfect performances in one of the best romantic dramas of recent years(n)

programme.title: Friends With Money
programme.desc: A single woman envies the security of her married friends, while they in turn dream of her freedom in this comedy drama. Olivia (Jennifer Aniston) is a single woman in her mid-thirties who feels she's reached a crossroads in her life. Unhappy with her career as a teacher, Olivia quits and takes a job as a maid until she sorts out her feelings. However, Olivia feels as if she could use some support, both personal and financial, from her best friends, all of whom at very least have more in the bank than she does. But that's not to say they don't have problems of their own. Christine (Catherine Keener) and her husband Patrick (Jason Isaacs) are screenwriters who have discovered that collaborating is more stress than they can deal with. Jane (Frances McDormand) is married to Aaron (Simon McBurney); they work together as designers, but while their professional relationship is cordial, they've become numb to one another as lovers and friends. And Franny (Joan Cusack) and Matt (Greg Germann) are a couple who comfortably support themselves and their children thanks to an inherited fortune; while their material needs are met, emotionally they can barely handle marriage and parenthood. Friends With Money was written and directed by Nicole Holofcener, who previously made the acclaimed independent features Walking and Talking and Lovely & Amazing(n)

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst is the French princess who just wants to have fun. Mix Oscar-winning costumes and tracks by The Strokes and Aphex Twin for a champagne cocktail with pop(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialise in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Kristin Stewart and Dakota Fanning star in Floria Sigismondi's rock biopic, based on Cherie Currie's autobiography. It's the mid-1970s and southern Californian teen Joan Larkin has changed her name to Joan Jett. Along with her new dark, edgy identity comes a nascent desire: to create an all-girl rock band. Joan and her aggressive manager Kim Fowley stumble across the perfect face for the band: 15-year-old blonde bombshell Cherie Currie. The two girls become close, with Cherie's sweet melodies slickly harmonising with Joan's electrifying guitar solos to great effect. They name themselves The Runaways and, after recruiting a lead guitarist and a bass player, are soon signed to Mercury Records, and plunged into the deep end of 70s rock excess. The success of their first album is massive. But, after a concert in Japan, the rest of the band discover magazines that feature only pictures of Cherie inside them - and are furious that they've been left out. Cherie begins to crumble under the pressures of being the face of the band, and finds solace in alcohol and drugs. As the band's stability disintegrates, can the girls rediscover the runaway rock and roll lifestyle they sought? Also starring Stella Maeve, Scout Taylor-Compton and Alia Shawkat(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars in Sofia Coppola's Oscar-winning film as over-the-hill actor Bob Harris, who is lured to Tokyo to "act" in a whisky commercial in return for big money. In the hotel bar, he bumps into Charlotte, the wife of a successful photographer on assignment who has been left to her own devices. Two strangers in an "alien" city, they form a friendship which slips into tenderness as they recognise each other's vulnerability. By turn comic and touching, the duo turn in pitch-perfect performances in one of the best romantic dramas of recent years(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Terry Gilliam (Brazil, Twelve Monkeys, The Fisher King) directed this colorful, stylized, pseudo-psychedelic $21-million adaptation of the 1971 Hunter S. Thompson classic, Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas: A Savage Journey into the Heart of the American Dream, about stoned sportswriter Raoul Duke, Thompson's alter ego, on a wild drug-crazed road trip, a paranoid plummet into the belly of the beast, with his pal, lawyer Oscar Zeta Acosta. Originally serialized in Rolling Stone (November 1971), the book catapulted Thompson headfirst toward the Kerouac-Mailer-Capote pantheon and jump-started the entire movement of "gonzo journalism." Carrying a suitcase of drugs, Raoul Duke (Johnny Depp with shaved pate) and his attorney Dr. Gonzo (Benicio Del Toro) drive a red convertible across the Mojave from L.A. to Vegas, where Duke has an assignment to cover the Mint 400 desert motorcycle race. As the drugs kick in, Duke ventures into voiceover, filling in the blank spots and narrative gaps. "This is not a good town for psychedelic drugs," says Duke, but even so, they consume vast quantities, eventually escalating to ether. Duke notes that with ether "you can actually watch yourself behaving this terrible way, but you can't control it." The two trash their hotel room, and Gonzo goes back to L.A. Thinking the hotel room holocaust will lead to an arrest, Duke begins a drive back to L.A., but after an odd encounter with a highway patrolman (Gary Busey) and a telephone conversation with Gonzo, he returns to Vegas to cover the District Attorney Convention on Narcotics and Dangerous Drugs in the glitzy Flamingo Hotel. This time the drugged-out duo trash their Flamingo room. The crazed carnival atmosphere segues into a carney casino, Bazooko's Circus, where a barker (Penn Jillette) spiels amid aerialists, clowns, and a rotating carousel bar. Gonzo worries over runaway teen Lucy (Christina Ricci), who paints portraits of Barbra Streisand. Soon the hallucinations begin: Duke sees Gonzo transmogrify into a demon with breasts on its back, and an acid vision of a Vegas bar features large legit lounge lizards (courtesy of monster makeup man Rob Bottin). Flashbacks depicting Duke's intro to the drug scene jump back to love-Haight relationships in San Francisco's Summer of Love. Cameos and guest stars include Mark Harmon, Cameron Diaz, Flea, Lyle Lovett, Harry Dean Stanton, Ellen Barkin, Tobey Maguire, and Hunter S. Thompson himself. The film features a Geffen Records soundtrack mixing rock of the period with Vegas lounge tunes. Over the years, various script adaptations came and went as did numerous talents; people connected with past efforts to film Thompson's book include Martin Scorsese, Jack Nicholson, Dan Aykroyd, John Belushi, and writer-director Alex Cox. Shown in competition at the 1998 Cannes Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Waking Life
programme.desc: From director Richard Linklater, who created the independent breakout films Slacker and Dazed and Confused, comes a digital video effort that has animated in a process called interpolated rotoscoping, brought to life by 31 animation artists who drew over live-action footage to create a dream-like state that is both real and surreal. The director works in a free-associative manner much like in Slacker and opens on a young vagabond arriving at a town by train. After a ride in an odd car-boat, he meets up with a professor who voices his deep philosophical leanings. The young man stumbles upon more figures that resemble the media, evolution, and even characters out of other Linklater features, including Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy, whose characters in Before Sunrise make an appearance, as well as director Steven Soderbergh, who relates an anecdote about Louis Malle telling Billy Wilder that his new film "is like a dream." A non-narrative piece that flows like a fever dream, Waking Life features voicework by over 70 actors, including Wiley Wiggins, Adam Goldberg, and Nicky Katt(n)

programme.title: Pi
programme.desc: Max is a genius and paranoid mathematician obsessed with finding numeric patterns. He believes there's a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature, which is the key for understanding all existence. Due to his theories representatives from a high-powered Wall Street firm and a Hasidic cabalistic sect try to pursue him. Winner of the Directing Award at Sundance Film Festival and Independent Spirit Award for Best First Screenplay(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Remake of the Steve McQueen caper film with Pierce Brosnan as a billionaire art fancier who orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece(n)

programme.title: Equity
programme.desc: A senior investment banker tries to prove her worth to her firm by bringing in a tech company that's on the verge of going public. However, the IPO causes her to get tangled up in an investigation into securities fraud(n)

programme.title: L'Auberge Espagnole
programme.desc: In this refreshing and lively comedy, a French student moves to Barcelona to study Spanish to improve his career opportunities. He moves in with six other European roommates and gets some lessons in life and love(n)

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross
programme.desc: Al Pacino and Alec Baldwin star in the award-winning drama depicting two days in the lives of real estate men competing in a sales contest where the losers will be fired(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: 1980s teen comedies finally get the parody they so richly deserve with Wet Hot American Summer, the first feature film from writer/director David Wain and co-screenwriter Michael Showalter, formerly of the sketch comedy troupe the State. It's the last day of the summer season at Camp Firewood, and as camp director Beth (Janeane Garofalo) prepares to wrap things up, the staff of teenage counselors realize this is their last chance to do something about the summer romances that have been brewing for the past three months. Sweet but shy Coop (Michael Showalter) is crazy about pretty Katie (Marguerite Moreau), but there's the problem of her severely moody boyfriend Andy (Paul Rudd). Meanwhile, Victor (Ken Marino) is trying to score with sexy Abby (Marisa Ryan), who is known to make friends easily, and McKinley (Michael Ian Black) and Ben (Bradley Cooper) attempt to keep their hot and heavy relationship a secret. Meanwhile, arts and crafts teacher Gail (Molly Shannon) turns to her students for comfort as her marriage falls apart, drama coach Susie (Amy Poehler) tries to whip the talent show into shape with Ben's help, and camp chef Gene (Christopher Meloni) deals with his unique sexual quirks with the help of a talking can of vegetables (voiced by H. Jon Benjamin). Beth even finds time for romance with socially inept astrophysicist Henry (David Hyde Pierce), but first Henry has to save Camp Firewood from a large piece of space junk about to re-enter Earth's atmosphere. Like Wain and Showalter, Ken Marino, Michael Ian Black, and Joe Lo Truglio (who appears in a small role) were also members of the State; fellow State alumnus Kerri Kenney was cast in a supporting role in the film, but her character didn't appear in the final cut(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: Luc Besson's high-end, high-octane mystery adventure set mostly in the 23rd Century. When a beautiful young woman falls into his life from another dimension, a New York cabbie discovers that Earth is facing an impending attack of pure evil. In a complex plot involving ancient curses, a corrupt corporate boss, all-powerful monsters, shape-changing assassins, laser battles and huge explosions, the unlikely pair set out to locate the five mystical elements that make up the only defence against worldwide destruction(n)

programme.title: Volver
programme.desc: Pedro Almodóvar's engaging (and at times surreal) profile of three generations of Spanish women dealing with life's ups and downs(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Remake of the Steve McQueen caper film with Pierce Brosnan as a billionaire art fancier who orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece(n)

programme.title: Far From Heaven
programme.desc: Housewife Cathy finds her husband kissing another man and her perfect life cracks apart at the seams. She finds consolation with her African-American gardener Raymond, which only draws more disapproval from her conservative neighbours(n)

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: A convicted arsonist schemes to get out of prison by convincing his debauched wife to seduce his retirement-ready parole officer in director John J. Curran's adaptation of a play by Angus MacLachlan (who also authored the screenplay). His career as a parole officer winding down after years of service, Jack Mabry (Robert De Niro) reluctantly accepts an assignment to reassess inmate Gerald "Stone" Creeson's (Edward Norton) case for an upcoming parole hearing. Convicted of setting a fire to make the murder of his grandparents look like an accidental death, Stone will do anything to get out from behind bars, and his wife, Lucetta (Milla Jovovich), is willing to do whatever it takes to help secure her husband's freedom -- including seducing Jack. Meanwhile, Jack's devoted wife, Madylyn (Frances Conroy), has suffered with the emotional weight of her husband's demanding job for far too long(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: Dysfunktional Family
programme.desc: Comedian Eddie Griffin delivers a set of his outrageous standup comedy and introduces his fans to the family who helped inspire his work in this documentary. In DysFunKtional Family, Griffin talks about race, sex, cats, dogs, slavery, terrorism, Michael Jackson, and several of the more eccentric members of his family during a sold-out live show. In between bits, Griffin takes us on a tour of his home town of Kansas City, where we get to meet his mother, who has a remarkable enthusiasm for corporal punishment; his uncle, who discusses his remarkable enthusiasm for pornography; and another uncle, who proved to be an invaluable help to Griffin's early career despite his drug habit and career as a pimp. DysFunKtional Family was directed by George Gallo, who previously worked with Griffin on the comedy Double Take(n)

programme.title: Ride
programme.desc: In this road comedy, NYC film school grad Leta (Melissa De Sousa) gets a job assisting music-vid director Bleau Kelly (Downtown Julie Brown), and a group of rappers, singers, starlets, and showbiz wannabes sign on for a video to be shot in Florida. The gang gets acquainted on a decaying bus as they travel down the East Coast, encountering barroom fights and other problems en route to the vid gig. Cameo by Snoop Doggy Dogg(n)

programme.title: We'll Never Have Paris
programme.desc: A man second-guesses his plans to propose to his girlfriend after a pretty co-worker hits on him. When his girlfriend flees to Paris, he follows her in a last-ditch effort to salvage their relationship(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: A black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican immigrant working as a maid for an affluent L.A. couple has to maintain control of her own daughter, who wants to assimilate(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Two paranormal researchers join forces with a nuclear engineer and a subway attendant to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The film revolves around the rivalry between the owners of a small gym named Average Joe's and Globo-Gym, a big-budget gym located across the street(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger loses his job, his car, his apartment and his grilfriend -all in one day - he decides he has only one option: volunteer for the army. And he talks his friend Russell into enlising with him. Where else, they figure, can they help save the world for democracy....and meet girls! John and Russell find basic training a snap: they are arrested twice, have endless run-ins with their drill sergeant and get into a big mess at a female mud wrestling match. They even steal a top secret government vehicle to take some gorgeous female Mps on a date, and wind up behind the iron curtain. Stripes is outrageous fun!(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: A romantic comedy chronicling multiple encounters between a shy British gentleman and an uninhibited American woman, who have their first brief meeting at a wedding and then continue to run into each other at subsequent sets of nuptials and one funeral(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: Hugh Grant plays child psychiatrist Samuel Faulkner who, ironically, can't stand children. So when long-standing girlfriend Rebecca Taylor announces she's pregnant, he's less than thrilled and eventually, fed-up with his moaning, she moves out to stay with friends Marty and Gail Dwyer. This being a Chris Columbus film, it all ends happily but not without a lot of fun along the way, particularly from Robin Williams as Russian obstetrician Dr Kosevich who is not just prone to malapropisms, but hasn't actually delivered a baby before(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally(n)

programme.title: Ever After
programme.desc: A self-reliant orphan in 16th-century France is disliked by her stepmother but adored by a prince in this progressive update of the classic fairy tale(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: Diane Keaton is a high-flying exec with the apartment and boyfriend to match. But she finds herself left a baby in a distant relative's will and, rather than give the infant up, takes her in. Soon, Ramis has left and she's lost her job. She starts a new life in Vermont, where local vet Sam Shepherd soon takes a marked interest in her in Charles Shyer's gentle comedy, which is lifted by Keaton's superb performance. The film was so successful that a TV series starring Charlie's Angel Kate Jackson followed(n)

programme.desc: Maggie, a young woman longing to start a family, becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist and his haughty theorist wife in this winning romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: "Revenge" is the watchword of this black comedy that takes a keen look at the self-centeredness, blind ambition, cynicism, and amoral behavior in modern-day Hollywood. Buddy is the control-freak Hollywood production executive with a reputation for abusing his employees. He is particularly abusive to his young personal assistant Guy, a recent film-school graduate and naive Hollywood newcomer. The idealistic young Guy is routinely humiliated by Buddy. Unable to stand anymore abuse and no longer the naive idealist, Guy turns on Buddy. He ends up tying him up and then subjecting Buddy to all the sadism, and torture Buddy inflicted on others. He threatens to do even worse, but is deterred by an unexpected arrival, whose presence leads to a surprising final plot twist. The film was first shown at Telluride Film Festival as The Buddy Factor but was retitled for its general release in 1995(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A frustrated cartoonist awaiting the birth of his first child is forced to reconnect with his dysfunctional family when his mother is diagnosed with a brain tumor(n)

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villian controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign(n)

programme.title: The Grace Card
programme.desc: A police officer (Michael Joiner) consumed with bitterness following the death of his son rediscovers the power of faith after being assigned a new partner (Michael Higgenbottom), who was a minister before beginning his career in law enforcement(n)

programme.title: Red Hook Summer
programme.desc: In this affectionate slice of life, a boy from Atlanta spends a summer in Brooklyn under the watchful eye of his grandfather, a bishop at a local church, and he connects with a pretty girl who expands his understanding of the world(n)

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: Fact-based film about the Buffalo Soldiers, who protected the Western territories after the Civil War. The tale focuses on a sergeant and his black cavalry troop, who deal with racial tensions while attempting to capture a vicious Apache warrior(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Lemon Scented You. Trying to work things out with his dead and unfaithful wife, Shadow's reunion is interrupted when he and Mr. Wednesday are kidnapped by the New Gods(n)

programme.title: In My Country
programme.desc: Langston Whitfield is an African-American journalist who is assigned to cover the South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission hearings by The Washington Post; Whitfield doubts the efficacy of this process, and sets out to interview Col. De Jager, a notorious former officer of the South African police who was famous for his violence against blacks, in order to put this method to the test(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Terry McMillan and Ron Bass wrote this screenplay based on McMillan's semi-autobiographical best-selling novel (over 2,000,000 copies in print before the release of this film). San Francisco stockbroker Stella (Angela Bassett), a 40-year-old divorcee, has a nice Marin County home and an 11-year-old son, Quincy (Michael J. Pagan). With Quincy off to see his dad, Stella and her best friend Delilah (Whoopi Goldberg) vacation in Jamaica, where she meets sexy, good-looking Winston Shakespeare (Taye Diggs). He's the man of her dreams in every way except one -- he's half her age. Even so, a romance develops. Grammy Award-winning songwriters Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis supervised the film's music and produced the R&B-slanted soundtrack album. Shown at the 1998 Urbanworld Film Festival (NY)(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: In the frightmarish tradition of "The Blair Witch Project" comes this nerve-jangling chiller. Jennifer Carpenter is outstanding as a TV reporter who gets confined to a quarantined apartment complex in Los Angeles that houses a mysterious, scary secret. It isn't long before she learns why someone was "screaming bloody murder." A remake of the 2007 Spanish horror film "REC." Directed by John Erick Dowdle, who cowrote the script with Drew Dowdle. Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Lemon Scented You. Trying to work things out with his dead and unfaithful wife, Shadow's reunion is interrupted when he and Mr. Wednesday are kidnapped by the New Gods(n)

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Following a cataclysmic world war, the leading world powers outlaw emotion, believing that doing so will reduce the chances of another conflict. Thought-police known as Clerics are sent to enforce the law and put offenders to death. When one Cleric accidentally misses a dose of the drug which suppresses his emotions, he begins to reconsider his role in the fight against expression(n)

Mick must use all of his bush craft, both in America and in his native Outback, to free her and collar the baddies(n)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Family sports comedy about a successful football player who has to sacrifice his career to look after the seven-year-old daughter he never knew he had. The fun-loving bachelor, whose gridiron career is about to take off, is shocked to learn he has a young daughter from a forgotten fling. Against the wishes of his ambitious agent, he immerses himself in fatherhood - exchanging training sessions for junior ballet classes, and touchdowns for dolls. Starring Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson, Madison Pettis, Kyra Sedgwick, Roselyn Sanchez, Morris Chestnut, Hayes MacArthur(n)

programme.title: Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow
programme.desc: When a nefarious villain named Ultron emerges to threaten mankind, the next generation of superheroes leaps into action and prepares to make their famous parents proud. It's been decades since Ultron defeated the original Avengers, and these days even the few folks that had held out hope for the future are finally ready to admit defeat. But Tony Stark has a surprise up his sleeve in the form of four amazing teenagers who just might have the power to defeat Ultron once and for all. But will James (son of Captain America and Black Widow), Pym (son of Wasp and Giant Man), Torunn (daughter of Thor) and Azari (son of the Black Panther) truly be capable of defeating the villain who brought about the downfall of their powerful parents? As the battle gets underway and Hawkeye's sharp-shooting son leaps into the fray, the team realizes that they might stand a fighting chance if they can only track down the mission Hulk and encourage him to become a member of the team. Should they succeed in defeating Ultron, this group will forever be known as The Next Avengers(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Fred Flintstone finally gets the job he's always wanted, but it may just come at a price(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: This "prehysterical" live-action farce is a prequel to 1994's "The Flintstones" and recalls the early days of Fred and Wilma's courtship. While the couple hang out with Barney and Betty in Rock Vegas, Wilma's ex tries to come between her and Fred. Mark Addy, Kristen Johnston, Stephen Baldwin, Jane Krakowski, Thomas Gibson, Joan Collins(n)

programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: If you could choose to live forever, would you? That's the thought-provoking question posed in Natalie Babbitt's famous novel, and this film based on it. The story centres round Winnie, a girl who lives in a very strict household where there's very little love or fun to be had. Then she discovers a mysterious family living in the grounds of the house, and falls in love with one of them. Jesse returns her affection, but then divulges his family's secret: they are immortals - people who will live forever since they drank from a magical spring. If Winnie wants to be with Jesse she must become immortal too. But there are lots of disadvantages - what will she choose? Teenage romance with a message in this touching family drama(n)

programme.title: Monkeybone
programme.desc: From Henry Selick, director of Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas and James and the Giant Peach, comes this equally dark film, starring Brendan Fraser as Stu Miley, an animator who's about to hit the big time on TV with Monkeybone, his cheeky ape creation. But on his way to celebrate with his girlfriend Dr Julie McElroy, his car crashes and he descends into a coma, trapped in the nightmare world of the comatose, which is populated by his creations, including Monkeybone. If he can acquire an exit pass from Death, he can escape, but Monkeybone steals the pass, takes over his body and prepares to "party" with the unsuspecting Julie. Can Stu find his way back to reality and his own body in time in this intriguing mix of live action and animation fantasy?(n)

Aladdin and the Death Lamp
programme.desc: Aladdin must trick a malicious genie back into his lamp before he takes over the world(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Nervous Man in a $4 Room. Though obviously an episode designed to absorb the costs of the more expensive Twilight Zone installments, this was one of the better efforts of the series' second season, with a tour de force performance by Joe Mantell as penny-ante gangster Jackie Rhoades. Ordered to bump off a rival gangster, the timorous Rhoades tries to summon up the courage for the foul deed, only to be thwarted at every turn by his own conscience -- who as it turns out has more "guts" than Jackie ever dreamed of. Though essentially a solo endeavor, the episode also features a good performance from future producer-director William D. Gordon as Jackie's nasty boss, while another future director, Brian G. Hutton, serves as Joe Mantell's back-to-camera stand-in when the actor "confronts" himself. Written by Rod Serling and scored by Jerry Goldsmith, "Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room" was the first episode produced for Twilight Zone's second season, even though it was telecast as the third episode, on October 14, 1960(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A Thing About Machines. An irascible writer (Richard Haydn) hates his mechanical devices---and the feeling is mutual. TV Repairman: Barney Phillips. Edith: Barbara Stuart. Policeman: Henry Beckman. Intern: Jay Overholts. Telephone Repairman: Lew Brown. Written by Rod Serling(n)

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: David Fincher's The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, an adaptation of F. Scott Fitzgerald's story, re-teams the director with Brad Pitt, who takes on the title role. What makes Button such a curious case is that when he is born in New Orleans just after World War I, he is already in his eighties, and proceeds to live his life aging in reverse. This sweeping film follows the character's unusual life into the 21st century as he experiences joy and sadness, loves lost and found, and the meaning of timelessness. Cate Blanchett co-stars along with Tilda Swinton, Elias Koteas, and Julia Ormond(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family
programme.desc: Adapted from the multi-talented playwright/filmmaker's hit stage play of the same name, Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family finds the cantankerous family matriarch using her unique brand of tough love to help her family weather some particularly rough waters. Madea's niece Shirley has received a frightening medical diagnosis, and she's having a hard time figuring out how to break the news to the rest of the family. Unfortunately she's not the only one in the midst of a crisis, either: Kimberly is suffering from anger issues that are threatening to destroy her marriage; Tammy's marital problems are being compounded by her disobedient children; and Byron is struggling to stay out of the drug trade after spending two years behind bars. Later, as a skeleton in the family closet pops into the picture, Madea and Aunt Bam show that love and laugher can help to overcome even the biggest obstacles(n)

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Overweight Professor Klump invents a formula that causes him to shed hundreds of pounds instantly and transforms him into an obnoxious alter ego. Though his studly shape gives him new confidence, he soon discovers the instability of his miracle potion. A comic twist on the Jekyll-and-Hyde tale and a semi-remake of the Jerry Lewis classic. Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett, James Coburn(n)

programme.desc: The One with the Hypnosis Tape. Meanwhile, Monica's (Courteney Cox) date yields unexpected results. And Phoebe (Lisa Kudrow) finds out that her half-brother Frank Jr. (Giovanni Ribisi) is in love -- and she's none too pleased with the woman in his life. Jon Favreau and Debra Jo Rupp make their first series appearances as Pete and Alice, respectively(n)

programme.desc: The One with the Screamer. As for Joey (Matt LeBlanc), his romance with co-star Kate (Dina Meyer) hits a professional snag. And Phoebe's (Lisa Kudrow) efforts to extend her phone warranty are literally put on hold(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Time-travel comedy in which 80s high school kid Marty McFly is accidentally sent back to the 50s in a DeLorean time machine. He inadvertently prevents his parents' first meeting as teenagers, then finds his mother is attracted to him instead of his dull father. Marty's existence is under threat - unless he can make his parents fall in love. Can he play matchmaker, sort out his family tree and get back to the future?(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Second instalment of the blockbuster trilogy starring Michael J Fox as time-traveller Marty McFly. Aided and abetted by the eccentric Doc Brown, Marty travels both forward and backwards through the decades to thwart the actions of arch-rival Biff Tannen who threatens not only Marty's offspring, but his own genesis!(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: The final episode in the fast-paced Back to the Future trilogy has time traveler Marty McFly heading back to the Old West to save his pal Doc, the inventor of the magical DeLorean time-traveling machine that took Marty back to the 1950s in the first film and shot him into the 21st century for the second episode. Marty's latest journey began at the end of Part II when he received a letter dated 1885 from Doc, who was accidentally stranded in 1885 by a stray bolt of lightning. The letter says that he cannot come home until he repairs the DeLorean, which he buried in the desert to keep it safe. Marty goes to dig it up so he can fix it and rescue Doc. Unfortunately, he is en route to the sight when he finds a tombstone with his friend's name on it; beneath it are the mysterious words "With Love from Clara." The date reads 1885. Marty realizes that if he cannot prevent Doc's early demise that Doc will never have existed and that will cause all kinds of problems. Unfortunately, no sooner does McFly make it back to the past, where he adopts the name "Clint Eastwood" when he gets into trouble, leaving his forbears to save him. Meanwhile, Doc, who is still alive, falls in love with the beauteous schoolmarm Clara Clayton, the girl he knows he must marry. They meet when he saves her from a runaway wagon. When not wrestling with their own problems, Marty and Doc must figure out how to fix the disabled DeLorean so they can return to the present. Needing the car to go 88 mph before it can breach time, the two devise a crazy scheme involving a stolen train, an uncompleted stretch of track and a yawning gorge that comprises the story's thrilling highlight(n)

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby

This time, they're on Chan's turf, in China, for a well-earned rest but the murder of US Customs men by one of the most powerful Triad gangsters in Asia sees them back in the thick of things, in the company of femme fatale Zhang Ziyi and secret-service agent Roselyn Sanchez. Some Mandarin/Cantonese with English subtitles(n)
