After running through such suspects as a disgruntled former boyfriend and an alcoholic ex-wife, the police and the D.A.'s office finally zero in on a person whose motives, under any other circumstances, could be described as noble and selfless(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Foul Play. The investigation into the death of a private investigator uncovers corruption, deceit, and immigration fraud in a Youth Baseball League whose manager will go to any lengths to win(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Attorney Client. The wife of an attorney with many disgruntled clients is killed, but the detectives believe that he was the intended target as he was willing to reveal information despite confidentiality agreements(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Oxymoron. At first glance, it is assumed that a murdered woman was a professional escort. But a clue found in the corpse's pocket leads the detectives to a "swingers party," where the victim had been in a fight with another woman. It is then revealed that the dead woman was a doctor who had been writing fraudulent prescriptions for the illegal painkiller Oxycodone. The outcome of the case is determined by an apparent betrayal within the ranks of a mob family(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Patriot. In the season finale, the detectives come to believe that a victim in a building explosion may have been a terrorist(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: American Jihad. An American Muslim (Wil Horneff) defends himself against charges that he murdered an academic who challenged his religious beliefs. DA Arthur Branch: Fred Dalton Thompson. Ed Landen: Richard Bekins. Francine Landen: Robin Mattson. Judge Borke: Donna Hanover. Green: Jesse L. Martin(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Shangri-La. Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) and Green (Jesse L. Martin) investigate the murder of a high school English teacher. Their prime suspect is shy student Fiona Reed (Stephi Lineburg), a troubled teenager who, by all accounts, is the product of a miserable, abusive home environment. Digging a bit deeper, the detectives and lawyers McCoy (Sam Waterston) and Southerlyn (Elisabeth Rohm) make the startling discovery that Fiona is not all that she claims to be -- and is not, in fact, even a teenager(n)

programme.title: G.I. Jane
programme.desc: A hard-edged, tough, action movie that looks at one woman's struggle to succeed in the ultimate man's world. Lt Jordan O'Neil makes history when she is recruited as a test case to be the first woman allowed to train for the élite covert operations unit, the Navy SEALs. Facing derision from resentful officers as well as the men with whom she wishes to serve, she needs every ounce of her courage and determination to overcome the obstacles put in her path, pass the gruelling training and become a member of one of the toughest fighting forces in the world. Her struggle is made even harder when she learns that even the 'feminist' senator DeHaven , who made her selection for the SEALs possible, is equally eager for her to drop out(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: An elite policeman is demoted after refusing to betray his partner and is later assigned to guard a narcotics kingpin on his way to jail. But the druglord has offered a huge reward to anyone who can free him from custody(n)

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Tom Cruise and Jack Nicholson star in a compelling drama in which a young and impetuous naval lieutenant and a more experienced officer are given the job of defending two marines accused of murder. As the two officers come to terms with one another, their investigation uncovers some sinister secrets and collusion at the highest level. The marines' commanding officer certainly has no intention of making the truth public(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle, the most-celebrated sniper in American military history. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children(n)

programme.title: Animal Kingdom
programme.desc: Eat What You Kill. A risky heist misfires and the boys blame Smurf, sending shock waves through the family, in the Season 2 premiere. Also: Baz deals with being a single parent; and Deran plans for the future(n)

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Tom Cruise and Jack Nicholson star in a compelling drama in which a young and impetuous naval lieutenant and a more experienced officer are given the job of defending two marines accused of murder. As the two officers come to terms with one another, their investigation uncovers some sinister secrets and collusion at the highest level. The marines' commanding officer certainly has no intention of making the truth public(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Sport of Kings. American drama series about cops and lawyers. A jockey is killed after stumbling across a horse owner's dark secret. In court, McCoy attempts to prove that the owner killed the jockey because he threatened to expose his fraudulent lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: True Crime. While investigating the death of a rock singer, Briscoe and Green encounter a former detective who's writing a book about the deceased's late husband, a rock star whose demise may not have been a suicide(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Tragedy on Rye. A tourist's video recorder captures the image of three men loading a stolen plasma TV into an SUV. The light-fingered trio find themselves murder suspects when a dead woman turns up in the apartment that they apparently robbed. As the trial progresses, ADA Serena Southerlyn (Elisabeth Rohm) cannot shake the feeling that the circumstantial evidence is not sufficient to send three dumbfounded people to their deaths(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Monument Point. Felicity realizes she needs to ask her father, Noah Kuttler, for help when Team Arrow learns what Damien Darhk's next move is going to be. Meanwhile, Noah and Oliver have a heart-to-heart talk that leaves Oliver rattled(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Coyote Piper. On the day of her high-school reunion, Piper becomes possessed by the spirit of an evil witch(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: We All Scream for Ice Cream
programme.desc: We All Scream for Ice Cream. The sisters trace a mysterious ice cream van that abducts children(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Blinded by the Whitelighter. A warlock slays a witch and steals her power to deflect objects and spells. The sisters pursue the killer against the advice of Natalie, the fallen witch's Whitelighter and an old friend of Leo's. Elsewhere, Phoebe is interrogated by a member of the district attorney's office who is investigating Cole's disappearance(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Don't Call Me Shurley. Amara unleashes a dark fog on a small town that causes everyone to go mad. Dean and Sam realise this is a stronger version of the original black vein virus Amara previously unleashed. They team up with the sheriff to protect the town but discover their old remedy no longer works. Meanwhile, Chuck returns with an interesting proposal(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: All in the Family. Amara shows Dean how she's torturing Lucifer. Worried for Castiel, Dean and Sam come up with a plan to rescue him from Amara's clutches(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: We Happy Few. Sam and Dean face their biggest challenge yet; Rowena makes her move(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Alpha and Omega. Season 11 ends with God coming to a decision about Amara that has direct repercussions for Sam and Dean(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Cinderella in Cardboard. When a bride-to-be's body is found in a bundle of compressed cardboard at a recycling facility, Brennan and Booth use records from a mobile-phone dating service to search for suspects from a long list of potential suitors(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Mayhem on a Cross. Stephen Fry guest stars as Dr Gordon Wyatt. Brennan and Booth venture into the world of death metal when a bassist's remains are found(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Double Death of the Dearly Departed
programme.desc: The Double Death of the Dearly Departed. Brennan is skeptical when a Jeffersonian colleague supposedly dies of natural causes, and she asks Booth to help her "borrow" the corpse so she determine the real cause of death. Meanwhile, Cam has trouble getting through to her newly adopted daughter about the dangers of smoking(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Girl in the Mask. Booth is confronted with a case that is too close to home: the gruesome murder of a friend's sister. With Brennan's help, can he catch the killer?(n)

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: Struggling author Eddie Morra overcomes his writer's block with a new drug that unlocks the full potential of his brain, and he forges a partnership with a businessman seeking to capitalise on his extraordinary skills. Meanwhile, some dangerous characters discover Eddie's secret and come gunning for his dwindling supply of the pharmaceutical(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle, the most-celebrated sniper in American military history. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children(n)

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: Comedy about the rise and fall and rise again of a NASCAR driver and his good-ol'-boy sidekick(n)
